review_text: Fells Point excellent harbor location. Walkable amidst restaurants, taverns, great bakery, local shops. Townhouse so charming and comfortable. Free parking. Easy check in-check out. Martin ‘s instructions are simple & precise.
Martins place was everything we needed and more for one night in Baltimore. Great location and there was always plenty of parking out front. We will return!!
Martin is a great host and was extremely responsive to messages. The property was clean and nice to stay at
Martin is responsive and polite, and the place and location are very good. the parking permit was very useful also.
Great Location, very clean and comfortable beds!! Would definitely stay here again. Highly recommend!!

What a great find in the heart of Fells point. Was perfect little place for a family get together for my daughters graduation. We were able to spread out, hang out with a couple of friends for a little graduation gathering. It was perfect. We had everything we needed in the kitchen. The rooftop was an awesome place to sit and just chat, it is at the very end of the busy streets for Fells point so the upper bedroom you could hear the noise and the band playing so if you’re a light sleeper sleep in the basement bedroom. but will absolutely stay there again. Great morning walks around the harbor.
Rental as described and in a great location with lots of restaurants.

Beautiful and very big place - 3 levels - great rooftop deck and awesome location in heart of Fell's Point. Clean and quiet and spacious, easy and free parking on the street. We were in and out a few times and found parking right in front. Lots of restaurants a few steps away as well as nice coffee shop across the street. Character and charm in Charm City, a great stay and wish we could have stayed longer!
Great host and wonderful stay. Right in the heart of Fells Point. Thought I might have an issue with the noise from restaurants but could barely hear anything.
This is an excellent location in Fells Point, with many restaurants and bars within walking distance. Martin’s place is spotless and well-kept, and he is very responsive.

Man, this place had me speechless. I felt right at home. Beautiful place. I would stay here every visit. I can't wait to come back. Martin, you're awesome! Clean and the view of the Harbor was breathtaking.
Beautiful home in the heart of Fells Point! Spacious, modern updates and very clean home that is very affordable!
Very nice place, clean and great location

Martin’s place is lovely! The rooftop area was superb for our birthday celebratory champagne toast. The beds were very comfortable. All was as described in the listing or reviews. It is so close to everything in Fells Point!

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this fully loaded Airbnb in Baltimore's Fells Point, and it exceeded all expectations! The location couldn't be more perfect – right in the heart of everything, yet still tucked away for a peaceful retreat. The attention to detail in the amenities made our stay incredibly comfortable, and the space was thoughtfully designed to comfortably accommodate four guests. From the cozy furnishings to the well-equipped kitchen, every aspect of our stay was thoroughly enjoyable. I highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a fantastic stay in Baltimore!

We loved our stay at Martin’s in Fells Point. After living in Baltimore for many years, I can attest to the quality of this location. Safe, quiet, good parking and central to so many things!!!!
The home was clean! We loved the beautiful bathtub and shower. The rooftop views were wonderful!
Such a great location on a quiet street. Would stay again!

I’ve been using Airbnb for 13 years and this place is now my number one rental. The pictures do not do this love justice. We enjoyed our stay and the convenience of its perfect location in Fells Point. I would 100% stay here again and bring my family with us!
This place was amazing. Martin is a wonderful host. Extremely responsive. Everything was exactly as described. Would absolutely stay here again.

Two of us had a lovely week's stay at Martin's house in Fell's Point. His home is very comfortable and clean with all amenities. The rooftop deck was an extra treat. Martin was prompt, friendly, and helpful in all communications. The location was prime Fell's Point, just a half block from piers and water views, with restaurants, shops, Broadway market, all around. A fabulous bakery Sacre Sucre just a few doors down, and another, Pitango, right across the street. Martin's place has become our new favorite spot to stay while visiting Baltimore, and we look forward to being there again.
One word, Spectacular. From front door to rooftop
We had a great time. Excellent location and very comfortable home. There was definitely street noise on Friday night, but it didn't keep us awake.
Martin’s place was a great stay. I especially loved the big jetted tub and cute neighborhood by the water! Very clean and just as described.

Martin's home was everything we wanted and more. Beautiful historic building with tasteful, modern amenities. The beds were comfortable, plenty of room. The location was perfect, with so much to do and see within walking distance. We couldn't be happier with our experience and plan to come back soon.

A wonderful place just steps from the hustle and bustle of Fells Point. It's a true neighbourhood gem, especially if it's your first visit/stay in the area. Martin's a great host. Provides timely responses and easy to understand instructions. He's kind and expresses gratitude. I would definitely book his place again!

My sisters & I were looking for a place to stay in Baltimore for a girl's get together. Martin's place was perfect! It was near the water, close to restaurants & very peaceful. The apartment was well appointed & spotless. The hot tub was a nice perk! Thank you for allowing us to stay in your beautiful home!
Martin's place was amazing. It was in the perfect spot with restaurants and bars just steps away. The place was very clean well managed.
Awesome location! Great house.
Perfect spot to stay and right in the heart of Fells Point! Very responsive owner. Definitely would stay here again .
Martins place was great and easy to find as well as enter. Great location for local restaurants and cafes for morning breakfast.

Martin’s house was in a great location in Baltimore, close to many restaurants and shops within walking distance. Very cozy with plenty of space. We would absolutely stay again next time we are in Baltimore!

We absolutely loved our stay at Martin’s place! The place was beautiful, from the exposed brick walls to the roof top patio with string lighting, it was exactly what we were hoping for in Baltimore. Check in was a breeze. We arrived a little late and were super hungry, and there were little bars and restaurants all around the immediate walking area, which was perfectly convenient. We ate breakfast each morning at the bakery/cafe directly across the street with a water view and it was perfect in every way. We spent our days there sightseeing, visiting the aquarium, and enjoying the multitude of delicious restaurants nearby. We ended our days relaxing in the jacuzzi bathtub and sipping wine on the rooftop to the beautiful city view. All in all, we had a wonderful stay and plan to revisit the area — and now we know exactly where we’ll stay.
Thank you Martin for the hospitality and the wonderful Airbnb!

I’ve stayed in ALOT of places in the greater Baltimore area. And this place is probably “thee” best locations I’ve ever stayed. It’s in the heart of fells point, quiet neighborhood , decent parking, close enough to be in the mix of things, but far enough to rest without the noise of the bar crowds. The beds are comfy, the place was clean,, I highly recommend!
Exactly as described! Perfect stay in Baltimore. 10/10 location. Martin was super prompt and helpful with check in instructions. Can’t recommend enough!!!

Overall we had a great long weekend at Martin’s place to celebrate our anniversary. I would definitely recommend this place and would stay here again. The location would be hard to beat. Some noise from local nightlife, but it didn’t bother us. The place was perfect for our needs.

Martin’s place looked just like the pictures. It was very nice! There was plenty food options and other places near by in walking distance. We enjoyed our stay. My only complaints would be that there was a few strands of hair on one of the towels that were hanging for us to use and when we turned the jets on in the jacuzzi there was a side that dirt came out of so there were some dirt bubbles and dirt on one side of the jacuzzi so we decided not to use it unfortunately. The shower was great though! Other than that no complaints, everything else was clean!
Excellent place and host

2nd stay at Martin’s place. Great location in the heart of Fells Point. But in a nice quiet side street. Couldn’t be any closer to restaurants and nightlife. Would love to return with warmer weather to really enjoy the rooftop deck and beautiful views! House had everything you could need and very clean!
I had a great stay. The house is beautiful, the location is excellent, Martin did a really good job.
Excellent location , welcoming house, ideal to stay in Baltimore.

Martin's place was great! My parents and I were in town for a quick overnight before an important doctor's appointment the next morning at Johns Hopkins. The location was so fantastic, and we lucked out and got a parking spot right out front, and Martin provided a parking permit which was very helpful. The home is lovely, clean, and comfortable. The upstairs shower was awesome. The place was as described and exactly what we needed for the quick trip. The neighborhood is pretty incredible - we couldn't believe how many amazing restaurants were super close, within half a block of the house. We had dinner at Penny Black which we absolutely loved. Despite it being a rainy during our stay, I loved walking around the neighborhood and grabbing tea and a cookie at the bakery across the street. I could hear loud music thumping late into the night from somewhere nearby, but I expected that given the vibrant location. I would definitely return to this spot on a future trip to Baltimore.
Great spot. Easy rental. Would definitely stay there again.

Amazing location in Fell’s Point, very walkable, close to great restaurants, nightlife, and bars. Comfortable 2 bedrooms 2.5 bath, three floors with stairs, nice rooftop access. A parking pass for 1 vehicle is provided for street parking. Highly recommend staying at Martin’s Airbnb.

We loved Martin’s place in Fells Point! The home was beautiful and comfortable! The neighborhood was charming and so well kept. We now love Baltimore and if we return we will definitely stay at Martin’s place again!
Beautiful property in an excellent location. Highly recommended.

This is a beautiful place right by the water and within easy walking distance to all the great restaurants and attractions. Martin is super nice, respectful, and helpful. I will definitely stay here again. Five stars!!

Martin’s home offered everything our family needed. Our kids had the basement bedroom and bath, we used the upper level bed and bath. We were even able to use the rooftop, which we didn’t expect in December. It was fantastic!!! Martin’s home is clean and well appointed.
To help other travelers, I will mention that the street was loud. This is not at all Martin’s fault or anything he can control but I wish I could have known. The area is home to multiple bars and clubs. While we couldn’t hear the establishments, from 11p-3a every night the street noise of cars, folks talking, music from cars, was a disturbance. For folks visiting for the purpose of nightlife or who are accustomed to city vibes this may not matter. As an aside, the basement bedroom was quiet. We only heard the revelers up in the upstairs bedroom. So a couple traveling alone could just sleep in the basement, which is what we plan to do if/when we venture back sans kids. We still had a great visit!!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Martin's place. We loved the space and all three floors, plus the awesome roof deck. The big tub was our favorite part! The location was prime; amazing bakery, nice shops, and a really terrific farmer's market. Thanks so much!
Had the best week here lovely I highly recommend the only problem is you won’t want to leave it’s just that great

Martin is a stellar host! We were in town for my son's graduation at MSU! It felt like he was just as excited as we were! We have found our forever home away from home. though my son has graduated, we are trying to find new reasons to visit Baltimore just to stay in his place! Thanks for being great Martin!
Thanks Martin for the great stay in Baltimore! Perfect location, clean and cozy!!!

Martin was a very responsive host! We loved every minute of the stay. The neighborhood is so beautiful with the water right in walking distance. Easy access to everything around but tucked away in a peaceful location! Definitely recommend 10/10.
Great location; well furnished and very comfortable. Martin is a great host. We will be back in the future

Martin
thank you for the allowing us to stay in your home! we enjoyed the neighborhood and the home was impeccable!

Martin’s place was a gem in Fell’s Point. Great location, near anything you want, and with great restaurants and nightlife nearby. It’s charming and well appointed. I’ll stay here again anytime I’m in Baltimore! Don’t hesitate. Book here and enjoy a great stay!
We had a great stay at Martin’s place. It’s a beautiful home in a great location. The area is great for walking and has great restaurants and shops.
Martins place was perfect! Great bakery across the street and lots to do and see in Fells Point and the surrounding area!! The house was clean and super homey! I will stay again for sure!!
Great host! Made our first trip to Baltimore a great one!

Martin’s place checks all of the boxes. I’ve been to many bnb’s between Fells Point and Canton, and this is by far the best. There’s a reason it’s 4.99 stars as of the time of this listing.
Location is perfect. Walking distance to great restaurants, cool bars, the Harbor, and even a killer cafe/bakery on the corner.
House itself is clean and tidy. Beds are very comfy. Internet TV is an incredible plus. Throw blankets to use. Go up to the rooftop for an absolute treat of an experience with a great view of the Harbor.
Martin is a great host and a real gentleman. He was a great communicator and very kind. Got to meet him in person for a couple minutes, and just the epitome of accommodating.
I will always try to stay here in the future when I come to town.
This was a beautiful home in a wonderful location! It was our wedding night and the entire visit was lovely. Thanks Martin!

Beautiful place in a great location! There is a lot of foot traffic so you hear random conversations while sitting in the living room, but it wasn't intrusive. The area is so conveniently placed right on the waterfront in a great neighborhood. We were able to walk and enjoy a variety of places with delicious food. We especially enjoyed sitting in the sun on the rooftop patio with breakfast and coffee.
Martin was very responsive and kind in his communications. We arrived very late on our first night and the instructions that had been provided made getting in and navigating the house super easy.

We had a great stay at Martin’s townhome. It is a fabulous location and walkable to all restaurants and shops in Fells point. Parking was easy which is great because that can be a hassle in this neighborhood . The house was very clean and had just about everything you need for your stay. There is bakery and wine bar directly across the street so from your morning coffee to your evening glass of wine - this home has it all! Would definitely return!!
Special note: it is in the heart of a bustling neighborhood , so outside noise can be a factor, but for us, we just loved being in the heart of such a beautiful and charming area. Martins place is a real gem!

The location was in the heart of fells point. The unit was just as described and fit our needs perfectly. Martin was a great host. The rooftop deck was great, and the place was clean and new. I would strongly recommend looking into this unit if you stay in the Fells point area.
Wonderful location and very clean home. Thank you!
Great place and great host!

Martin, thank you for sharing your home with us! We had a wonderful time in Fells Point. The location was perfect! Lots to do! We will miss our morning walk enjoying the city life and smelling the freshly baked bread along Aliceanna Street. Whole Foods was within walking distance. Parking was challenging along our street but if you circle the block a few times you can usually get a spot close by. The beds were a little firm for us but having the additional quilts really helped with additional ‘padding’. Loved being able to watch movies without using our login credentials. The kettle was perfect for hot tea and my hubby loved your coffee maker! The deck is fabulous and the view incredible. The master bathroom is great especially the jacuzzi and the massager head in the shower. Having a washer/dryer in the unit was excellent! Martin was very accommodating with check-in/check-out due to airline changes! Martin’s place is a real gem! We look forward to staying here again when we return!
The best location! Martin was a wonderful host. The home was perfect. Very clean and well maintained. We will be back for sure.

Very easy to find, excellent location, very clean, comfortable, well stocked home. The coffee shop across the street has great coffee and amazing baked goods. Some really cool places to grab a drink or have a great meal. Easy to walk and 2 blocks from the water taxi. It’s a popular area and Parking is a little tough sometimes but we found a spot pretty quick just circle the block a couple times. Highly recommend this house to anyone visiting the area.

Spectacular place in every sense of the term. Comfortable condo, spacious, light, and airy. Everything is so well-kept. The rain showers were squeaky clean and super relaxing, and the split floor plan was perfect for our group of 4. The rooftop was a beautiful touch, and the location could not have been better. 10/10 would recommend. Hope to return again!

This townhouse was amazing. Beautiful and perfect for two couples to share. I was here in business and the cost saved us hundreds. The location is perfect to all restaurants and bars on Thames st. Martin was responsive and great.
Lovely location and accommodating host! Would absolutely stay again.

I can not say enough about this amazing property! Martin’s home is a must-stay if you are coming to Baltimore!
Location is unmatched - right in the action in Fells Point so you’ll have plenty to do/see while you are here. Coffee, restaurants, bars and shops are within 500 feet of the location. We parked our car the day we arrived and it sat until we left.
Property is clean, decor is well thought of and stylish. There was nothing we needed or would have wanted to have as an amenity. We were visiting for a girls trip so we really appreciated the large stand alone walk-in closet on the second floor and giant bathroom to get ready in! The best part however was the amazing rooftop with unmatched views! We spent hours there enjoying conversations and watching the sun set/rise. If this property is available the next trip to Baltimore we will be booking it!

Martin's place was just as expected - squeaky clean in a great section of town with everything in walking distance. We even walked to the Inner Harbor! But then got the water taxi back to within a block of the house. The rooftop patio was a neat space with warm lights and a table and chairs. Not an amazing view, but not a terrible one, either. We could see water from up there. Martin's communications were prompt and instructions were very clear.

This place was better than the photos! Beds were comfortable, well stocked kitchen, and the shower was awesome! We were right in the middle of all that Fells Point offers, but quiet at night. We will definitely stay here next time we visit Baltimore. Love the rooftop! Thanks, Martin, for sharing your home.

My dad and I stayed at Martin's townhome in Fells Point for a couple of weekday Orioles games. Martin was an excellent host throughout. He accommodated our early flight and allowed us to check-in early despite having guests from the previous evening. The townhome is centrally located with many bars and restaurants within walking distance. The neighborhood has a really cool vibe and always felt safe. No problems getting Ubers or taking the water taxi which is located nearby. The townhome is newly renovated and all of the amenities are as described. If I'm ever back in Baltimore, I would certainly stay again!

We absolutely loved Martin’s place and our time spent there. The location in Fell’s Point is perfect - easy walks to great restaurants and things to see and do. The parking pass was a wonderful help, we never had difficulty finding a spot on the street. The house is spotless, comfortable, and very nicely updated. The upstairs bed was comfortable, and the upstairs bathroom is gigantic and very well appointed. The upstairs was a little warm thanks to Mother Nature, but it was never a problem. As others have noted, this place is right in the middle of the Fell’s Point nightlife, so you will hear some people in various states of revelry. If you need complete peace and quiet, it may not be ideal for you. If you like people watching/listening and don’t mind a little commotion, this place is ideal. We would definitely stay at Martin’s place again.

Martin and his Fells Point home are wonderful! It was a five star experience all around with two exceptions. The top floor was a bit hot (Martin offered to come and show how to fix the AC radiator when I mentioned it to him) and the street can be loud at night (we had to call the cops because a group outside was super loud. Both of these things - Baltimore summer heat and party summer nights - are out of Martin’s control.
Would highly recommend to anyone !
The home was exactly as described. Great for two couples. Will definitely try to return again. Couldn’t ask for a better location. Parking pass included has a fantastic plus!
Great location in the heart of Fells Point. Martin's place was clean and as shown in the photos. 5 stars -- would be happy to stay again.
Martin was very friendly and accommodating. The house was just as described and well kept. We enjoyed the ability to easily walk the city and enjoy a quiet vacation.
Place was great! It was clean and the rooftop was a very nice perk, I would say my favorite spot for sure.
Martin’s place was great, I loved coming home to it after a long day. The location was perfect and Martin was a great host. I would definitely recommend.

Martin's charming house in the heart of Fell's Point was a perfect retreat for my wife and me. We enjoyed two delightful nights exploring the vibrant neighborhood and witnessing an exciting Yankees vs. Orioles game at Camden Yards. The immaculate house provided all the essential amenities, and Martin's thoughtful provision of a parking pass secured us a spot right in front for the entire weekend.
The rooftop was a highlight, offering a lovely view as we savored our morning coffee from Daily Grind. Our Inner Harbor excursion on game day was effortless, thanks to the nearby Baltimore Water Taxi.
We truly enjoyed Fell's Point with its enchanting shops, lively bars, and delectable restaurants. As a lesbian couple, we always research our travel destinations and were thrilled to find Fell's Point to be a diverse and welcoming community, allowing us to stroll around and feel safe.
Thank you again, Martin. If we return to Baltimore, we will undoubtedly choose your inviting home once more.
Great location. Martin was a great host.
It felt right at home. Thank you for having us.

Our overnight stay at Martin's home was wonderful! The home was exactly as pictured and had everything we needed. The whole place was very clean, the beds were comfortable, the water pressure was perfect, and the living room was a cozy place to hang out. The neighborhood is walkable and the house was close to many restaurants, bars, and small shops. We only wished we had stayed more than one night! We had the opportunity to meet Martin at the end of our stay and he was very friendly and accommodating. If you are looking for a great place to stay in Fells Point we highly recommend staying at Martin's home, and we look forward to future stays!
Amazing location right in Fells Point! Close to restaurants and local activities. Highly recommend!

I had a great experience at Martin’s place. The place was easy to find and parking pass was provided. Martin’s place was clean, inviting and located in a great area. I went with my husband and 2 y/o and it was a very cozy and comfortable stay. 11/10 would recommend. Thanks Martin!
This place was awesome, very clean well kept and in an awesome location. So close to many bars and restaurants! Great experience!

Martin’s home is a great oasis in the Fells Point area. As someone who spends a lot of time in hotels and air bnb’s, I am very particular and it was great to see Martin is as well. His home is located in the perfect place on the street, plenty of parking available in front of the home and he provides the necessary parking pass. The area is quiet but there is plenty of activity so you do not feel isolated if traveling alone. Martin gave excellent information about accessing the home, very detailed information to make you feel at home and is not overbearing. The home set up is perfect if traveling with a family or friends/colleagues. Great water pressure, cold A/C, and iron and ironing board (necessary for me). He provides ample towels and bed linens, laundry detergent, wipes, paper towels, etc to last your entire stay. High end appliances and stoneware in the kitchen and an overall great environment. I will definitely stay here again. A+Thanks again Martin.
Great location. Liked the variety of restaurants and coffee shop nearby. Very lively neighborhood on Friday and Saturday nights.

Had a lovely stay at Martins place! There had been some power issues in the area and Martin was extremely proactive in making sure I was informed of the power status and worked with me every step of the way to ensure it was a smooth check in and a comfortable stay! The place was exactly like the pictures, everything was clean and had great furnishings! The area was very nice with cafes and restaurants within walking distance on beautiful cobble stone streets. I would highly recommend anyone visiting the area to stay here and would gladly come back!

Martin is a FANTASTIC host with a great place in Baltimore.
My teens loved staying there and the layout gave them just the right amount of space to relax after a day of sightseeing.
The home looked just like the photos. The entire space was very, very clean. The kitchen was stocked with all the utensils and dishes one might need.
Plenty of restaurants and shops within walking distance, too!
Best of all, Martin was quick to respond with helpful answers when needed.

Fantastic spot nestled in Fells Pt, right on the water. Tons to do right there, and spectacular view of the fireworks!
Thanks Martin!
Awesome location, great place to stay! Had a wonderful weekend here with family!
The location was perfect, exactly what we were looking for. The options for restaurants were awesome and centrally located enough for the sights and transportation out of town.

The house is spacious, incredibly clean, and updated. The location is perfect, you are in walking distance of tons of restaurants and bars and a cheap Uber ride from anywhere in Baltimore. Martin was super responsive and friendly. We will definitely be back :)
Great gem! Perfect for a relaxing time in Baltimore.
Great location in fells point, just steps from the water and attractions

I LOVE Martin’s place and highly RECOMMEND his place. The terrasse view is amazing! And the Jacuzzi! The neighborhood is one of the best in Baltimore City. I got the chance to see Martin as I was leaving and he was super friendly!
Great location in Fells Point. The home was lovely and the rooftop was nice! Martin communicated effectively on what to expect.
Martin's home was AMAZING! Sparkling clean, well furnished and decorated, and in a wonderful location. Would absolutely stay again!

Fabulous place to stay and so clean and easy to communicate with Martin. He was so responsive when my friend and I needed more hangars and he brought them over so fast. The rooftop patio area was unique and it was very nice to just plug in the soft glow patio lights in the evening and enjoy the view. The WiFi for the TVs throughout the home provided very good speed for streaming Netflix, YouTube etc. Pictures accurately show the home. The main level has living room, kitchen and a half bath and downstairs is a bedroom and full bath and upstairs a MBR and bath with separate shower and jacuzzi. The location is very convenient to the thriving Fells Point area and we enjoyed the water taxis access, restaurants and theater there. A bakery and cafe right across the street had great breakfast foods too. All in all, we appreciated Martin’s professionalism. The waters in the fridge so much appreciated too. Thank you!
Place was kept in great order and host was responsive.
Great Location and nice place. Would definitely stay again!

Martin’s place was immaculate. Beautifully decorated w/ top of the line finishes. The rooftop overlooking the harbor was a plus. The location is central to Fells Point and very walkable. Be aware that the neighborhood can get very noisy late at night — so if you’re a light sleeper, choose the bedroom in the basement. And consider bringing your own pillow(s) if you want to avoid a stiff neck when you wake up. The pillows in the unit are rather bulky and have very little give. Other than that, we enjoyed our stay!
Martin's place exceeded expectations!
Spotless well appointed property. Great location and a very responsive host! Can’t wait to come back and stay here again.
Amazing property and location, we will be back.

Had such a great time visiting Baltimore Harbor!! Martin’s place is right in the heart of Fell Point with several choices of restaurants/bars! The place was clean and comfortable! Would highly recommend this place to anyone!
Martin was very responsive. Excellent location and updated interior. Minutes away from the water, attractions, and restaurants.

This is a great place right in Fells Point. It was spotless, and Martin was a great host. I loved the fact that one bedroom was in the basement, so it was quiet for sleeping, despite being right in the thick of things. Definitely would stay there again!!
Also, loved sitting on the rooftop deck in the morning!

Martin was an excellent host. He was very responsive when we had some trouble, and he always reminded me that he's always there to help.
The location is excellent, right close to the water, and in front of a cafe. The bath and rooftop are extremely nice addition to make the stay special. It was for my parents visiting, but Martin's house made them want to live here.
Martin was a wonderful host! The house is beautifully maintained and in a great location walkable to lots of bars, restaurants and shops. Martin was very responsive. Would absolutely stay here again!
Awesome

Great location, excellent host! Fells Point is a fantastic location with walkable coffee shops, restaurants, bars, and shops by the waterfront, and Martin's place right in the heart of it. The house was very well stocked except for facial tissues - orherwise had everything. Martin was helpful, proactive, and responsive. Light sleepers should be prepared to sleep in the basement bedroom because the upstairs master gets a lot of noise from the surrounding nightlife, but it's worth it to be in the heart of all the action. we loved relaxing on the rooftop deck morning and night.
Great Airbnb in a great location. Martin was extremely responsive aswell.

Martin's place is a wonderful spot to stay in for touring all that Baltimore has to offer. We were able to park our car and walk to all the major attractions. The roof top deck was a beautiful spot to see the harbor.
Martin was very quick to respond to any of our concerns.
Fells point can be a noisy area at night. Bring earplugs.
Lovely and cozy stay. Location is perfect. Had some clubbers disrupt us during the night but other than that WE LOVED IT!
Beautiful location, with so much around it. The house has everything you need.
amazing time loved the location and hospitality

Martin's place was fantastic. Close enough to the inner harbor to be convenient, but just far enough away to not be noisy all night long. The house was very clean with nice modern furniture. Lots of amenities were available, and best of all the space was not cramped like some locations can be when a host tries to have to much furniture in the house. Martin was very responsive and helpful anytime I had questions. I definitely recommend staying at his place.

My husband and I were traveling with our teenage son and Martin's place was the perfect spot for us since we were in Baltimore for 5 days. The layout, beds, bedding, 2.5 baths, location, parking pass, kitchen, washer/dryer, cleanliness, and over all quality of everything in the home made it so comfortable and relaxing to live in. The location felt safe, lively, and desirable due to the easy access to everything you would ever want to walk to while visiting Baltimore. Martin is a a conscientious and great host. We had an excellent stay!!

Martin was very responsive. Answered every question we had. The townhouse was spotless from the basement all the way to the roof deck. Two person soaking tub was great for me and my wife. Parking was a bit of a challenge, but we got lucky each time. Would definitely go back there if in Baltimore area again. ! Best Air BnB experience I’ve had.

Martin’s home was great! Awesome location, close to everything in Fell’s Point! Very clean and well thought out! Everything you’d need was taken care of! Martin was a great host! Hoping to be a return guest!

Martin is the Ultimate Host! His home is absolutely beautiful and in the best location. He did more than most hosts ever do with perks in the bathrooms down to water in the fridge. If I could rate him more stars I would because everything from checking in to leaving was perfect. We loved the place so much we stayed an extra day and Martin was just so accommodating about the whole situation.
Martin, thank you for making our weekend in Baltimore absolutely special. You really have a Gem. We can not wait to return!
Best regards,
Shalyssa

If I could rate this place 6 out of 5 I would! It’s perfect! I’m in Baltimore frequently for work and this was definitely the best place I stayed in! Martin is a great person- went above and beyond- very responsive host. I would have extended but a lucky person got to me before I could! Close to everything, sidewalks clean and safe, parking was so easy and pass is provided. Very comfortable place!

amazing experience!

This is a gorgeous houseboat. Beautifully decorated, spotlessly clean, and very well appointed. The interior design is spectacular. We especially loved the shower!! Privacy shades throughout the boat make it easy to close off the view from outside to inside. We stayed overnight on a Saturday and the waterfront was very lively and fun to watch. Surprisingly, everything quieted down by about 10:00 p.m. (perhaps there is a noise ordinance on the harbor?) and it was very quiet to sleep overnight. Most of the boats in the marina were empty, but several friendly dock dogs passed by with their owners on Sunday morning. We loved Flohom 01!

Brian was the perfect super host. Self-checkin and parking is super easy provided you read all the instructions. Communication with Brian was easy throughout our stay and he was extremely accommodating, which helped to make our stay enjoyable. The FLOHOM is an excellent lodging option when visiting Baltimore while on vacation or on a staycation . This luxury houseboat has all the amenities you could possibly need during your stay with the best panoramic views of the city’s Inner Harbor. The rooftop deck offers the best front row seat to the most beautiful sunrises and sunsets. There are a lot of special touches added to help make your stay memorable, to include an amazing FLOHOM playlist that you can easily stream from your smartphone to add to the ambiance of the FLOHOM experience. Highly recommend choosing Brian to be your host during your next trip to Baltimore.

Let me start off by saying, this home is immaculate! My biggest regret was; I only booked for one night. Moving forward, I will have to book two-four nights. This place is five stars and will definitely book again.

Absolutely amazing place. I will definitely be back. Completely worth the price. Just go for it. You'll love every second. Even down to the neighbors. Thanks so much Brian.!

Beautiful garden, quiet room, great location. Charlie--the friendliest, furriest concierge--was an added bonus.
Jennifer and Scott were wonderful host. Their dog Charlie was super friendly. The place was spotless and just as described. I will be staying at there place every time I have to be in Baltimore.

We Enjoyed Jennifer and Scott’s willingness to be flexible with our check in and check out/ leaving our luggage so we could explore the nearby Aquarium.

Jennifer and Scott were super responsive and helpful with recommendations. Their space was very nice with a beautiful garden view. Centralized area within walking distance to lots of great restaurants. Really enjoyed the stay.
The Secret garden was very clean and a great location.

Great 2 night stay here! Easy and early check in, easy check out. Space was clean and comfy! Backyard area was peaceful and nice. Great location, just a few minute walk to the water and a ton of bars and restaurants. Street was quiet. Communication with hosts was easy and fast. Will definitely stay again!

We had a great stay at Jennifer and Scott's place. We came very late at night so at first we were a little lost, but we found the parking garage easily and it is very close. Easy to find and easy access to parking even in the city ! Very comfy room with a beautiful outdoor space. Host was very nice and their dog is the sweetest !

Memorable stay with Scott, Jenn and their dog Charlie! My one year old quickly made friends with her and in fact, when I was away at work, spent hours playing and relaxing with her. We enjoyed one night in the Secret Garden. Scott met us right away to make sure we got in and settled. He gave good recommendations and we were kindred spirits sharing our home state of Minnesota! The artwork in the space created a lovely sense of peace along with the full view of the garden right outside the window. Everything in the space was carefully chosen and beautifully arranged. Bed was comfortable and space was quiet on a Monday! We recommend.
Best place we’ve ever stayed. Hosts were wonderful. Friendly & helpful. Felt right at home.
Awesome place and very friendly.
Great spot in an awesome, quiet location. Wish we could have spent more time here!
Great stay walking distance to waterfront and restaurants. Really kind hosts and Charlie was adorable. Highly recommend!
Clean, comfortable, and perfectly located -- we had a great weekend at Jennifer and Scott's place! They were extremely responsive and even suggested a few great local places to eat.
Very clean and great location thank you so much 😊
Everything was great

The place was just as described and shown in the photos. It was very clean, cozy and with an easy check in and check out process. The location is excellent and we were able to walk to nearby cafes and restaurants. There is an affordable parking garage just 2 mins away. It was easy to communicate with Jennifer and Scott. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend their place to others.
Loved the place! Would definitely stay again if they're available next time I'm in town.

We had a wonderful time at Jennifer and Scott's place. The design of the place is beautiful, the bathroom is super comfortable and brand new. The back yard was really nice. We loved walking around the area. Highly recommend!
We enjoyed our short stay here. Jennifer and Scott were very accommodating and friendly. We loved the garden and the convenient location to downtown.

Really loved my stay at Jennifer + Scott's place. Everything was as described and the back patio / garden view was just like a magical painting. There are tons of great food and beverage options all around and Scott was always super responsive anytime I wrote to them. The bathroom and suite were both beautiful and I could tell how much love they put into their place. Internet was great and so was the in-room coffee. Very kind, caring hosts!

We loved our stay in the Secret Garden in the City! Scott and Jennifer were very warm and welcoming, providing us with a spectacular recommendation for Italian food our first night in town. The Airbnb was in a wonderful location and had the weather been nicer, we would have loved to use the outdoor space. There were so many bars and restaurants close by that we wanted to try, but ran out of time! We also loved meeting their dog, Charlie! She is so sweet!
Great place, great host!
Perfect - thanks!

Jennifer and Scott’s Airbnb was clean, accessible, and as described. Was a great space for an overnight trip near Fells. We had a chance to meet both of them and their dog Charlie briefly and all were friendly! Would not hesitate to stay again!

If you're looking for an artsy spot in an upscale row home with magical, private indoor/outdoor spaces in the heart of Fells Point, look no further!
This home has every comfort & convenience, and a LOT of HEART.
We appreciated having loads of privacy, as well as easy access from the street to our room (without feeling we were disturbing the hosts).
There are many restaurants, entertainment options, & the Inner Harbor within walking distance or a quick Uber ride from the property.
We recommend: The Blue Moon Cafe for b'fast/brunch & The Port for local comedy.
We had the privilege of meeting Scott and his darling canine companion, which turned out to be a bonus to a wonderful trip!
Thanks for hosting us, Scott and Jennifer!
Great place, great location
Amazing treatment

Jennifer and Scott were super friendly and went out of their way to let me in and tell me where to find cheap parking (the garage just around the corner is only $5 over the weekend). This area of town was a little bit loud at night, but as a light sleeper, I slept pretty soundly even though the room is right under their stairway.
Great stay! I really enjoyed the garden/patio area. I love how it smells like fresh croissants as soon as you walk outside! Lol
Jennifer and Scott were very responsive and so helpful with all the questions I had. We regret not staying longer it was a short visit. Perfect location and walkable to everything.
Wonderful place! Great location and very clean suite. Easy parking nearby also!

Wonderful stay, perfect for our quick trip. Hosts were able to allow early checkin. Beautiful updated space. Of note, there was no TV, but didn't affect our experience. Conveniently located with lots of bars/restaurants in walking distance.

What a great place! Would definitely recommend their place to prospective guests. It was within walking distance to the harbor which made it the perfect location.
Jenn ń Scott's airbnb exceeded our expectations and made our overnight stay a truly enjoyable and relaxing experience.
Great stay, I would recommend this place. There are tons of restaurants in walking distance!

I had the most enchanting stay at the Secret Garden in Baltimore! The host was incredibly accommodating, allowing for a flexible check-in time and even granting me the freedom to do laundry. The ambiance of the garden was truly magical, making my visit unforgettable.
I highly recommend this lovely place to anyone seeking a charming and welcoming Airbnb experience. It’s modern, it’s chic, it’s a great space for a quick visit.
Very communicative hosts who are flexible and accommodating. Location is in a good part of town that's just a short walk to lots of businesses. Recommended!
This is a great place. Scott and Jenn are excellent hosts and the location of the place is very good to enjoy Baltimore's downtown area. I highly recommend it and will stay there when I come back.

Jennifer and Scott’s place was just perfect. We were only in town for a night so didn’t have the pleasure of meeting our hosts, but their communications were super friendly and helpful! The room was clean and cozy. The location couldn’t have been better—situated a short walk to Fells Point and the downtown attractions. We hope to return sometime so we can enjoy the lovely patio when it’s not snowing! :). Highly recommended!
Truly outstanding! Super clean, super pleasant. In a great location. Highly recommend.
Our stay was fantastic. It’s a great home base to have if you’re planning on exploring the city. We will definitely be back!

The place was easlily accessible, which was important for me since my daughter is mobility impaired. The host helped her get here rollator into the house, and was very friendly. It could use a mini fridge and microwave.
Jennifer and Scott’s listing was very clean and secluded. The parking was fairly cheap and in close proximity of the listing . Would highly recommend!!

As a New Yorker I loves seeing all the old buildings being repurposed. Looks like a fun neighborhood. With walkable places. The room had a Wonderful shower ! Clean and comfy bed with a view into a garden. I Liked the art on their walls. As a painter it was fun to discover they have in interest in art. Would have liked to meet them but had to run early in am and go to event that day so maybe next time. Defiant would stay there again.
Scott and Jennifer were great hosts and the place was lovely! They were kind enough to hold our luggage for a few hours after checking out. My friend and I had an amazing time staying here!

We loved out stay at Jennifer and Scott’s! They were so helpful and gave such clear instructions. Their space was super clean and easy to find. It is super close to sooo many great restaurants and bars! Would definitely come again!
Great location, clean, and love the view to the secret garden. Nice and quite and cozy. Would stay here again.

Easy, clean, welcoming, and the place is located near so many neat amenities. My girlfriend and I are already talking about staying there again for another romantic weekend trip. Thanks, Jennifer & Scott! 10/10 experience.
beautiful garden
Great place- very cozy.
This place was great for our local getaway. Luckily, we had a warm day to enjoy the garden while working remotely. The place was clean and as advertised. Thank you.
Great place to stay for a visit. Walkable to the waterfront and entertainment area.

Great location within walking distance to numerous restaurants and areas to visit.
The room was extremely clean and tidy with an amazing shower! The outdoor area was nice, and we enjoyed watching squirrels from the bed.

Scott, Jennifer, and Charlie (their beautiful fur baby) were terrific hosts, and I enjoyed my stay! It was perfect for my last night in Baltimore after a conference, and I appreciated their flexibility.

Jenn and Scott’s place is a beautiful, quiet sanctuary in a fun part of the city. Loved the outdoor garden area for some fresh air and reflection. I’d definitely stay here again for my next visit - far surpasses the typical conference hotel for the price.

Came for 2 nights for a conference and this was perfect spot. Nice 10 mins walk to hotel on the harbor. Safe neighborhood and actually this is a historic row of houses. Really felt comfortable and it is soo quiet I had great nights sleep. Scott is super responsive and helpful with early check-in ; it is easy to come in and out and walking distance to some good bread & cafes. Would definitely stay again and hopefully in spring so I can enjoy the garden more!

I would stay at the Secret Garden again if I return to the Baltimore inner harbor area. This was a great option over of the pricey conference hotel. It was easy to find, had easy keypad entry, was within walking distance to my conference, and Scott, Jenn, and their dog Charlie were very kind. The private garden was perfect for reading and meditation. I highly recommend this place.
Jennifer and Scott made us feel right at home. We appreciated the warm chats and extra espresso pods!
Great!

Scott and Jennifer's place was a perfect, quiet nook while I was in town for a conference. I love the artsy feel of the place and the access to a garden/patio space is so welcome vs. being in a generic hotel room with windows that don't open!
Great spot, friendly hosts!

Great crash pad for the weekend. Wouldn't recommend for a longer stay as there is no fridge or TV, but if you're like us and are out exploring the area most of your stay this place is great! Comfortable, clean, and parking in the garage was a great bonus too!
Awesome modern guest space. The hosts were so friendly and welcoming. Would definitely go back.

Lovely stay at Scott and Jennifer’s private guest suite. The room was small, yet airy, immaculately clean, calm, relaxing and modern - I love what they did with the patio and backyard. They were also very friendly and flexible with my checkout time, which I appreciated! Highly recommended and very close to all the fun in Fells Point and walkable to Canton and Patterson Park.
Really enjoyed my stay at Jennifer and Scott’s place. Would recommend to travelers looking for a quiet location with easy access to things to do in Baltimore!
We greatly enjoyed our stay! Scott, Jenn, and Charlie are very friendly and the suite was very private and exactly what we needed.

Jennifer and Scott's place is great--a little oasis in Fells Point. It is one of the most modern-feeling AirBnBs we have ever stayed at--everything feels new and clean. The room is spacious, the ceiling is high, and the courtyard in the back is a lovely place to have coffee in the morning. We would definitely stay here again.

the place was cute, quiet, comfortable. The cleanest place I've ever stayed! The bed was a great night's sleep. The hosts were wonderful, responded quickly. Conveniently located, would highly recommend!
Great spot for a quiet stay.
Great spot in Fells Point. Very walkable, and fun places in the neighborhood. Beautiful garden and friendly hosts. Charlie is such a sweet dog!
I loved it, it was peaceful I felt like I was somewhere else it was clean

Scott and Jen’s place was a great little place. They have a nice hidden garden in the back. Highly recommended a couple. We had our 2yr old with us so it was kind packed, but that is entirely on us. The location was great as it was a short walk to the heart of Fells Point and many good restaurants. We had the pleasure of meeting Scott when we checked in and he was great. Definitely recommend their place!
This place was the perfectly located and everything was so close by. Inside was very clean and easy to settle in.

This spot was perfect for our one night stay in Baltimore! It was clean, comfortable and conveniently located to our destinations. The hosts were a bit loud past their initiated 10pm-7am quiet time, this was the only inconvenience we encountered.

Scott and Jen were the most gracious hosts, and their secret garden suite was outstanding. Perfect place to stay when visiting Baltimore. Highly recommend this unique suite with its lovely, private garden!

The secret garden is perfect for a weekend in Fells Pointe. It’s quaint and quiet feel was perfect to relax after a busy day. Jennifer & Scott we’re always quick to respond and provide a great local suggestion.
Hosts are very accommodating--excellent place for a quick stay.
Great hosts, very comfortable stay!
Great location to be close enough but off the beaten path in Fell’s! Friendly hosts and private space - great stay!
This was a cute quiet little place to relax after a busy work conference!

My friend and I were looking for a place in Fells Point . We are so glad that we found the Secret Garden! Thanks Scott and Jennifer and Charlie!

My parents stood one night here and they had nothing but positive things to say about their stay. I really appreciate how accommodating are Jenn and Scott also with their rapid responses!
Thank you again!

Loved my stay here!! It was everything I needed after a long cross country journey to move my son here. Comfy bed, nice shower, beautiful garden scenery and coffee!! Plus Scott was so helpful and made us feel so welcomed! Thank you so much for your kindness and hospitality!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ all around!!!

Great little spot in Baltimore - walking-distance to the restaurants and bars of Fells Point and easily reachable through the bus (note: they don’t run that often). Communication was great and I had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Bed is comfy, outdoor garden space is beautiful, and the neighborhood is quiet.

The room was as described. Within walking distance to Fells Point. Short car ride from the Inner Harbor. Located on a private street with a beautiful back patio. Hosts were very responsive. Would recommend to others.

This incredible little garden apartment was the perfect getaway. It felt secluded and cozy despite being located in a city! The apartment was spotless, it was easy to access, and the garden was beautiful. Jennifer and Scott had excellent communication and were very friendly. I'd recommend this place to anyone.
Jennifer and Scott’s place was super easy to find and a great stay! We felt right at home. Thank you again!
Zen like experience in the middle of Fells.

This was a great find and special place. We were greeted by Jennifer and Charlie (fur baby)- very friendly and helpful. The bedroom looked out to a beautiful garden. We visit Baltimore every year or two and would hope to stay in their place again. Thank you for making us feel at home!

The secret garden is an oasis in the heart of historic Baltimore. The home is peaceful, surrounded by row home architecture. Fells Point a short walk away, is one of the most historic neighborhoods in Baltimore. We enjoyed our stay and felt welcomed into Jennifer and Scott's home.

Jennifer & Scott were great hosts. Check in was a breeze and the room was quiet and comfortable. The bathroom was spotless and also very nice & updated. While they’re close to all the bars in Fells Point, they live tucked away on a quiet street that felt very safe.
Great place. Very clean and tucked away. No television, but will return!!!

They hosted my son, his wife, and my future granddaughter. My family had a wonderful time. They felt safe and secure. They were able to walk to all the good stuff in Fells. Thank you again for making my family feel right at home.

Great location, with a cheap parking garage around the corner. This place is great if you need a place to crash for the night, not the best hangout space unless you utilize the back yard. A mini fridge and a small TV would be a great addition. Scott and Jen were very accommodating.
Great place! Thank you!!

Wonderful hosts and beautiful space! Great location and a quick walk to inner harbor. The secret garden was amazing. There’s even rocks to paint and leave there. Jennifer and Scott accommodated our needs and helped us have a great stay. 10/10 would recommend.

Host was really helpful with suggestions. Place was clean and perfect for our stay.
Beautifully renovated home in Fells Point. I had a seamless stay.
we had such a lovely stay here! the garden is beautiful :-) thanks for hosting!!

Jennifer and Scott were great hosts and their space was exactly as described in the listing. They were very proactive in making sure we had no issues when checking in. I would absolutely book with them if we visit Fells Point in the future.
Jennifer and Scott were very responsive leading up to our stay. We had a late arrival so we didn’t get the chance to meet them, but they were very accommodating and easy to reach if needed!
We enjoyed the very lovely, stylish accommodations but above all Jennifer and Scott's kindness in all of our interactions. Thank you for hosting us!

Really a quality place to stay. Gorgeous bathroom and private patio/garden. Clean, efficient, and many thoughtful touches. Great location in lively, historic Fells Point. Close to Harbor East, vast new Whole Foods, and more. Highly recommended.

This place was AMAZING! Truly a secret garden within walking distance to all the fun in Fells.
I'm bookmarking this for future stays.

If you plan to visit Baltimore , Jennifer and Scott’s place is a great stay.

The prefect spot in Baltimore to see the downtown and Fells Point area. This Airbnb is exactly as described :)

Great stay in a really cool neighborhood.
Very walkable area with a nice outdoor areas.

Jennifer and Scott are wonderful and friendly hosts! The space is a lovely little guest room on the ground floor of their home in Baltimore. Designed for those looking for a peaceful, quiet retreat, there is no television. Instead, they offer games! There is also reliable and fast wi-fi if you must use your computer. My only suggestion would be to add a small refrigerator and/or an electric kettle.
Note: do not be confused if you look on G* Maps and see a different house! Jennifer and Scott did a complete rebuild a few years ago.

We enjoyed being so close to Johns Hopkins Hospital and Fells Point - great restaurants and coffee shops, and only a short drive to JHU. The perfect location. Jenn and Scott are wonderful hosts, friendly and helpful. The apartment was very clean and it was easy to find parking in the street nearby. We enjoyed looking out at the beautiful little garden and will definitely return again. Super hosts.
Jennifer and Scott’s place was a fantastic place to stay! The secret garden was a great way to start the day. Lots of places ti visit nearby. The hosts were very responsive and polite!

Secret garden in the most walk able neighborhood of Baltimore! The in-law suite and bathroom were clean and exactly as described. Hosts made the check-in/out process super easy and provided a list of local recommendations in advance, which was greatly appreciated.
Would highly recommend staying here if you find yourself in Baltimore!

Place was described as the listing. Just be aware there’s no certain amenities such as a kitchen or tv (which is indicated although I do think a freezer or microwave would’ve been helpful esp if you trying to stay here longer.) Overall, pretty cleaned but lots of bugs so just be cautious.

Location is great- short walk to the waterfront and ton of restaurants, and parking was easy. It’s right next to a bread factory that makes the street smell amazing. Cute spot in walkable neighborhood with restaurants and shops near by. Host was very responsive to questions. Space was clean and comfortable. My only suggestion would be to have a mini fridge and a glass for water. Overall it was a good spot and affordable!

This was a short stay yet a good one. Jennifer and Scott were responsive all the way through the process. I ended up arriving at the same time as Scott who was friendly. Great place to stay and fantastic hosts!
Just the right size for a night's stay. Beautiful garden to sit beside while enjoying a cup of coffee. Would definitely stay here again.

Jennifer and Scott’s place was perfect for a short weekend trip to bmore. We were in the city for a friend’s wedding party and only need to stay one night and we loved it. Perfect for our short stay - the secret garden is beautiful!
It was a very nice space. Had everything necessary for a small stay and the hosts were very kind.
The hosts communicated with me clearly and were very helpful!
Clean and cute!
Loved staying here. Easy check in and check out process. Thanks for having me!
Loved staying at Jennifer and Scott’s place. Very clean and cozy vibe and very helpful hosts.

This bnb was absolutely perfect for our travel needs. It was artfully appointed and very well thought out, providing a clean comfortable space. If travels bring me to Baltimore, would absolutely stay again.
Really enjoyed this cute suite for a small work trip! The area is also unbeatable and walkable to Canton and the marina
Incredible backyard and everything we needed was there, Jennifer, Scott and Charlie were all very sweet!

I was only here briefly but I had a great time. Location was very walkable, I had just ran a 10 mile race the day before so it was great because I didn't have to go far for dinner or breakfast. Thanks for a wonderful stay. Your home made me miss the creativity of homes in the Mid-Atlantic where I used to live.
Thank you to Jennifer and Scott! Fantastic hosts, and a fantastic property!

The garden area is very serene even when it is cloudy and in Spring :) We would stay again! Thank you both.
Enjoyed my stay! What a great place and location if you’re visiting Baltimore. Exactly what I was looking for.

We had a great stay at Jennifer and Scott’s place. The apartment is very well done with modern furnishings and really nice touches to make us feel right at home. This is a little gem of a place. The location is top notch, located on one of the many small residental streets of Baltimore. It's very cozy and comfortable, with a gorgeous bathroom and fantastic outdoor space. Would recommend to solo or couple travelers looking to stay in the ever popular Fells Point area!

We loved this place! Jennifer and Scott are super friendly and provided a fantastic map of local places to check out. The area is amazing with lots around to walk to. We only wish we had stayed more than one night!
perfect for the one night we did!

Jennifer and Scott's place was really clean and comfortable! We only stayed for one night, but we had a really good time. The bed feels almost like a cloud! The place was spotless. The secret garden was really beautiful. The location was also very close to near restaurants. Would definitely recommend staying here for a couple of nights.
Jen and Scott have great little place to stay near Fells Point. Wonderful place and will look to stay there again.
Convenient location to get around. Shared entrance and private floor/room location as noted. Scott was very friendly and Charlie was definitely a highlight.
Enjoyed my stay here. Guest suite was very clean. Scott is proactive with communication and easy to get in contact with.
Helpful hosts. Clean, bright space. Very walkable area!
Great location for a one night stay.
The secret garden was a cozy and quiet place to sleep. Exactly what I was looking for.
Great location near the inner harbor. Glad we found this spot for our brief visit to Baltimore.
Easy stay with a location/suite almost exactly as described. Great communication from hosts -- helpful with early check in. Will stay again!

This was a high quality and spotless accommodation. Twelve miles from BWI. Great communication with the hosts. Early check-in was accommodated. A quick 7 minute walk to my favorite Fells Point spot: Max's Taphouse (best tap list in Baltimore?). I hope it's available on my next visit to Baltimore.
Exactly what we were hoping for! Cute place in a great location! It had everything we needed!

Jennifer and Scott’s place was truly a home away from home. The cleanliness, the communication, and secret garden were 5 stars! Definitely the most friendly and helpful host you can find. They really give a true bnb experience. If you book you won’t regret it!
Scott was great and very responsive to my questions. Would eximirlo stay there again!
Great space to explore Baltimore from
Lovely place to stay in a very walkable part of Baltimore. The view from the room is beautiful and peaceful even during the winter months.
