Parking was a little tight when we arrived in the rain after 5, but it worked out after a few times circling the block. And Charlie, their dog, gives kisses if you let her, which is an added bonus for us!
Beautiful and unique space, with tons of shops, etc. in walking distance. Hosts were great - quick communication and clear instructions at checkin/checkout. Will definitely stay again!!!
Scott was very communicative & nice! The place was super clean and private. We really enjoyed our experience:)
Great location near dozens of restaurants and bars, very comfortable space, and incredibly helpful and friendly hosts. We would absolutely stay in this AirBnB again.

My partner and I only had one night's stay in Jennifer and Scott's spacious bedroom/bathroom place, but we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We were given very clear instructions for the entire experience there. They were friendly and very responsive responsive to our questions, and were flexible on our departure time. We were impressed on the art and design of the entire space, and would have used the attractive back yard space, just outside our bedroom, had it been warmer outside. We will definitely return if the occasion arises.

Scott was friendly and welcoming. I did not get a chance to meet Jennifer, but I did get to meet their dog Charlie who was friendly as well.
The space was clean and comfortable and I highly recommend Jennifer and Scott as hosts for anyone stopping in Baltimore

Jennifer and Scott were very proactive, communicative, and flexible! Charlie the dog was a sweet touch ☺️ comfortable bed and the spot had just the basics plus a great back deck, which was perfect for us since we spent 95% of the trip out of the bnb.
Great place, loved the private courtyard garden. Nice location, and easy enough to find free overnight parking around the corner.
Scott was very friendly and supportive! Everything was in walking distance!
Scott was super nice and the house was beautiful. Great location and able to walk to most places.
Scott and Jennifer were excellent hosts. Great location, comfy bed, 5 stars.

So glad we chose to stay here! The location is excellent. Fells Point bars and restaurants are right on your doorstep, Little Italy is one neighborhood over, and Inner harbor is about a 25 min walk away..There is a car rental a couple of blocks away and a parking garage with convenient hours and very reasonable prices nearby.
The guest space is modest, but is perfect if you are planning on spending most of your time exploring the city. Host and and co-host are lovely too!

Jen was super sweet along with her co-host Jen. They are very nice people. Her place was absolutely amazing, spacious and comfortable. The art work around the house was beautiful! I would highly recommend this place to anyone needing some peace of mind and comfort. Thank you again Jen&Scott and the co-host Jen, you all were amazing and all so sweet!
Great stay. Thank you so much for the hospitality. Could not have been better.
Potentially the best AirBnB experience I have had. I had a great time getting to know Scott and the location was perfect.

This cute place is tucked on a quiet street in a great location, walkable to the waterfront, Fell's Point, and downtown. The house is lovely with a backyard and a terrace, and the hosts are super nice. I recommend it!

Jennifer and Scott have a very lovely home and I felt super comfortable staying with them. I was attending a music festival in baltimore and they were very accommodating with my check in time. The code to get in was very useful as I was unable to check in until very late. I didn’t see them much during my stay as I was busy but for the short times I did they were both extremely kind and helpful. If I come to the festival again next year I definitely hope I can stay at their home again! Also, the Blue Moon Cafe was a delicious recommendation for a late breakfast. Super cool place only a couple minute walk. Feeling like I was in a safe place was very important to me as I was coming in late and by myself and I was not worried at all staying with them. Thanks again Jenn and Scott!
Great place to stay! Everything was perfect. Will definitely be staying again!

Jennifer and Scott's place is very clean and in a great location. Scott was very polite, friendly, and responded to my questions fast. I had a good stay. I will stay with them again if I go back to Baltimore.
Easy communication between us . Cute residence . Nice backyard .
Jennifer and Scott were wonderful hosts, quick responses with communication. We enjoyed their lovely home.

The room was a perfect jumping off spot to hang out in fells point and the inner harbor. The whole place was really cute though so we could have definitely felt at home on the patio or in the living room if we stayed in more.

Jennifer and and Scott were very accommodating and their townhouse is in an excellent location, within close walking distance to the harbor and a number of great restaurants, coffee shops and a Whole Foods supermarket. And for anything farther, the electric scooters, Uber and public transportation should suffice.
The luggage rack in the closet was also a nice touch. One piece of advice for anyone using the keypad — the “unlock” button needs to be held down for a couple of seconds after entering the code or it won’t work. Overall, a great experience and highly recommended. 👌🏼

Jen & Scott’s place was lovely, very well located, and check in was super easy. In addition, they were very flexible and super accommodating to our needs. I wouldn’t think twice to stay at their place again, highly recommend!

Jenn and Scott have a great place within walking distance of the Harbor and convention center, as well as tasty restaurants and Whole Foods, CVS. They were very welcoming and polite hosts, highly recommended.
Super clean, great location, great hosts.

Jennifer and Scott are simply great people! Warm and inviting home in a PRIME location! They have the most gorgeous outdoor patio area! It was so close to everything we wanted as part of attending Maryland Deathfest. We will stay here again!!!! 💖 Clean, very communicative hosts and a very comfortable stay!

A little tricky to locate for the first time but absolutely worth it for the comfort, hospitality, and friendliness of the hosts.
As a woman traveling alone to a city with a rough reputation, I was nervous taking the risk of staying at an AirB&B several blocks from where I’d be for work, but those nerves were quickly dispelled!
Scott and Jenn were welcoming, helped me get oriented and had me feeling like family within the first few hours. I could hang out and chat with them in the common areas or have absolute privacy in my room. Sharing the main bathroom was never an issue, I had fridge space and full use of the kitchen, and Scott went above and beyond helping me get laundry done even with an out of service washing machine.
The house is an easy walk to the inner harbor and I did it daily for a conference. If I was out after dark I took a Lyft (in the advice of four different locals—it is a city), and the scooters available through Uber were easy to find and a lot of fun to get around on.
There is a Whole Foods within a few blocks so grocery shopping was no-stress, and another block from there was a Starbucks (I’m from Seattle, it’s an addiction, I’ll own it). I was a little overzealous one day and walked all the way to Fort McHenry (caught a Lyft back) so while I don’t necessarily recommend doing that, it tells you how walkable everything is.
Highly recommended and I hope to stay there again next time I’m in town.
A wonderful place to stay!
Jennifer and Scott were so kind and welcoming. It was a lovely stay in Baltimore because of their hospitality!

Jennifer and Scott were great communicators and very flexible on my trip changes. The space is adequate, but in a perfect location to walk to a lot of the inner harbor areas.
The bedroom floor is slanted a bit...which was no issue on the bed but did make it odd when using the desk in the room. Other than that, no real complaints especially for the price, location and great hosts.

We decided to take in Baltimore on a budget and Scott and Jenn help made this possible. Their beautiful space is perfectly located within walking distance to Fells Point. There is a parking garage around the corner that had $4 daily specials on the weekends that is clean and safe. During the week it cost me $21 a day. Scott provided us tips on locations and answered all our questions. The space is clean and it was a special treat for me to have french pressed coffee in the morning. All this contributed to making our trip to Baltimore an exciting adventure.
Wonderful space, close to fells point restaurants. Scott and Jen were very easy to communicate with, and made the process seamless
A great deal and convenient
Quaint, clean and exceedingly comfortable stay. Jennifer and Scott were warm and responsive hosts. Would highly recommend.

Jennifer and Scott took the time to learn what I wanted from this trip in order to give me personalized recommendations on how to best enjoy the city! It made my time in Baltimore feel comfortable, safe, and easy. Their home is very clean, with charming and authentic touches throughout. I’d love to have the chance to stay with them again!

Keith's place was everything he said and more. Great stylish place. Wonderful and convenient location. So many great things nearby and his instructions to the place made it so easy to find. Def plan on coming back.

Pros: If you are planning to visit downtown, the location of the suit is great. Silent and calm location. Close to the car park. We loved the location and silent nature of the place. All the stuff is ready to use and enough for your needs.
Cons: Except in summer, if you are seeking for warm place the air condition can not be enough for you. There is an additional electric heater but it will take time to feel warm. We had this feeling for the first 2 days because the weather was cold outside. The curtains could be cleaner but not a big issue for us except cosmetic look.
Neutral comment: Yes, there is an issue with the disturbing walking sound coming from the upper floor. On the other hand, people should learn how to walk while staying in a rental place. Nothing to say about this to owner according to us.
In general, there are some topics for development but the suit offers more than enough compared its the price.
Splendid host, 10/10 experience!

Keith was very friendly and responsive as I got into Baltimore. I was able to easily find the unit and get into the parking garage. The area was extremely walkable, parking was easy to access and I felt safe walking around, getting to restaurants, etc.
A few things that were not explicitly mentioned in the listing:
- There were other people in the unit above me and I could hear them on the stairs and in their unit
- There's a thin curtain that separates the sliding glass door from the outside and across the way is the kitchen of other unit
- The heater is above the door and only warms one third of the room and there were no extra comforters; if you're someone who runs cold, bring sweatshirts
- The alley used to get to the unit was very narrow; wearing a backpack or carrying larger luggage made it hard to maneuver with the gate.
Overall the stay was great! I really enjoyed the location and having somewhere nice to stay.
private and quaint. perfect location. easy to walk to activities and cheap parking for Baltimore.

I liked my stay here a lot. It was a peaceful spot--even though it is on a busy street it feels a bit tucked away because it is behind the other house. Walkable to nice areas of Fells Point (Ekiben is great food and very close). There was cute decor there too. My only complaint is check-in--it could have been clearer in the description of how to get in. I wasn't sure which house it was and did not want to accidentally go into the wrong one so waited a bit. If you go here I recommend checking in during the day so it's easier. Keith was responsive and a nice host however and this place has a good vibe.
Will stay at Keith’s again.

FABULOUS stay and the BEST location Baltimore has to offer. Literally Fells Point and Harbor East restaurants and shops were within 2 blocks. Centrally located to EVERYTHING and easy to get anywhere. On street parking always available. Keith proactive in communication and appreciated the booklet of information and history of the studio space which was unique and cozy. Stayed for a week and it felt like home. Perfect for a business traveler or couple visiting Baltimore and wanting to be in the heart of everything the city has to offer. Thanks Keith for a wonderful week in Balitmore!

Neat studio near practically anywhere you’d like to visit in Baltimore. Feels new and comfortable, except for the lock that is jammed and will not lock from the inside. Anybody with access to courtyard can slide your glass door open. Mentioned it my first night to the host and no resolution. Overall chic and cozy

This was a great place for me - one person who spent the days elsewhere (visiting family) so just needed a comfortable bed (check 1) and a great shower (check 2) and strong Wifi (check 3). It was attractive and comfortable, including a good desk chair. I didn't use the kitchen, except for drinks in the fridge, so no comments on that. On my last day, my family drove down to see the place (and they loved it), and then we walked to Whole Foods for breakfast and then on to the inner harbor for morning fun.
Parking was easy - I found a spot on Caroline each time I returned to the apartment. But it was reassuring to have the long instructions on how to find parking elsewhere had I needed it.
There was some street noise on Thursday night but weirdly not on Friday or Saturday - or maybe I just adjusted to it :-)
Instructions were very clear but still, Keith answered the questions that I did have quickly and clearly.
Highly recommended.
Loved it here. Eastern Ave is a perfect point to walk right to the Harbor, restaurants, shops just everything. Has everything you need for a nice getaway or stay in the city.

Overall, the hosts were proactive and friendly, and even shared a list of recommended things to do in the area. I was only in for work, but staying in a converted art gallery was an interesting change of pace. For the most part, everything was fine, and the space itself was surprisingly insulated from noises on the street. The only thing that really surprised me was how thin the ceiling/walls were. I was able to hear every footstep that the person upstairs took, which was particularly disruptive for me as they were most active around midnight.
The hosts do have some solutions for this, such as a white noise machine or earbuds (and have them in the space if you do need them), but just be aware of this ahead of time if you're a light sleeper. In the future, I'd probably make sure to be on the second floor to avoid this (or bring earplugs of my own).
Perfect for a quick getaway, cute space and great location in Fells.

I was in town for a quick 1-night trip. Instructions were detailed and made it easy to check in. They provided a map of recommendations which was very useful for exploring before we checked in. The booklet they provide you is helpful and unique as well!

Great stay. Clearly communicated instructions and solid place.
Only thing is that I would recommend to get ear plugs as there might be noise (walking, not music etc.) if there is another guest above this room.

Overall, we enjoyed our stay here - it was clean, comfortable, and within walking distance to everywhere we needed to go. Free street parking was easy on a Sunday night. While the apartment was quiet due to being a bit off of the street, the noise from the upstairs guest was very loud and unfortunately occurred between 1 and 2am both nights we were there. Just something to be aware of as it did impact our stay.
Great stay - clean and beautiful apartment. Host did an excellent job of communicating.
The room was very convenient in location. It was very close to all the main restaurants. Great for a quick weekend trip to Baltimore!
Perfect private studio. Not what one would expect from the outside looks. Easy to get in, clean, private courtyard.
Great place to stay! Super responsive host. Comfortable bed and walkable to many attractions! Would stay again.

Communication with Scott was seamless, easy to get ahold of and he did great checking in with us as well with places to eat and check out.
If you have never been to Baltimore it's a really small big city with a lot to do in a small area.
Lots of museums, observation deck with cool views, Fort McHenry, lots of good eateries and places to grab a nice drink.
Their place is within walking distance to pretty much everything and what I personally liked best is that there is no TV so it really allows you to get out and enjoy what the city has to offer.
Good solid choice if you don't need to have a TV when you're exploring a new city.

I was able to get an early check in because I arrived a little earlier than the standard 3pm. A good location and free of noise because the location isn’t directly on the street. Everything was super clean and the price was very reasonable. I plan to book here again the next time I visit Baltimore.
Anyone considering booking here will not be disappointed.
Great stay at Jennifer and Scott’s! Would stay there again if in Baltimore!
good place
great place to stay in Baltimore, for either short or long term stays. I felt very at peace in the suite. 100% would recommend! Also, Jennifer and Scott were super helpful!

We had a great stay! The location is super walkable and peaceful. The water was very close. The studio was clean and well stocked. I really appreciated the guide with restaurants/things to do nearby, we went to several of the recommendations Jennifer and Scott listed out. Overall we had a great Airbnb experience!
Jennifer and Scott's place was very unique and artsy. I needed a quick break for day for my birthday in the city and their place was good choice.
This was a great stay! It had everything I needed, and the bed was very comfy! Jennifer and Scott are excellent hosts, and we’re very welcoming and communicative. I’d stay again.
Very cozy place and great hosts. Walkable to lots of stuff nearby
Extremely cost effective and in the perfect area of relying on public transportation. Restaurants and grocery store/convenience stores nearby.
Great place to stay for a few nights if you’re coming in for a conference. Spacious , very walkable, and a great desk space.
Very responsive had a small little problem and they was so nice to accommodations just like the picture and close to fells point
So happy that we found this studio, it was perfect for our stay. The studio is absolutely beautiful, close to so many restaurants. Definitely would come back
Great place - was happy that the other residents abided by the quiet policies at night!
Super convenient location, walkable to a lot. As pictured. Very comfy bed.
Very convenient to Fell's Point offerings and Johns Hopkins Hospital. Super convenient, clean, modern space. Thanks for a great stay!

Wonderful hosts! A lovingly renovated and furnished brick house, in the typical style of the district, "Fenn's Point". Everything you need is there, even an umbrella, office supplies and charging station and cable.
The guest manual provides valuable tips. Plenty of towels and blankets.
Jennifer and Scott live around corner and are willing to help and tangible if needed.
Great place to stay while attending a conference at one of the waterfront hotels. Jennifer and Scott were great hosts and the space was exactly what I needed!
Lovely area and a great place to stay!
Great place , great location, and great hosts! Exactly as described and perfect for my visit.

The sense of privacy and escape in this AirBnB was very welcome and surprising given how it is in a busy part of Baltimore. The little walkway one takes between buildings to get to the small courtyard and studio entrance reminded me of being in Europe and added to a sense of this being a get-a-way :-)
The studio itself feels very open with high ceilings and clean lines. The bathroom is terrific, with a wonderful large shower. Adequate kitchenette option, very clean and it was nice that it was stocked for making coffee :-).
Cozy and very clean! Would absolutely stay again. Close to a lot of places to eat and drink as well.
Fabulous little place! Just what I needed for a last minute trip to my favorite town!
Very nice place. Walkable from inner harbor (15 minutes) and close to Little Italy for good eats. Scott and Jennifer give good, detailed instructions on how to access the place.

What a phenomenal little apartment. I loved how modern it was. very cool. Bed and bed linens just wow! most comfortable stay I have ever had at an airbnb. On point. My only concern was one that is my own and out of hosts control, blond small female rolling her suitcase and carryon around homeless and sketch people down on their luck after I parked in the garage. Super happy I checked in before dark to get my bearings. My friend who lives in BWI stayed with me that night and basically said," it's Baltimore" and shrugged her shoulders. Anyway carry pepper spray ladies if you're alone or plan on walking down to fells point and back at night or even to the whole foods a few blocks down. The parking garage was only $4 after 4 pm for the whole night which is awesome. Safe travels and seriously enjoy this awesome setup they have created (no TV was perfect for me).

What a wonderful spot! This place is just outside the middle of it all, but once you’re in the courtyard and the room, the city feels and sounds a million miles away. A great find, well priced, and everything you need if your plan is to spend your time roaming the city. Scott and Jennifer are super responsive and communicate well. Great instructions for checkin and checkout. A safe walk to Fells, Little Italy, and Harbor East. Eden Garage is super close, and for EV users they have chargers in the garage. Will definitely look to reserve again when headed back for an overnight in Baltimore.
Convenient, clean, comfortable. Accurate description.

As a female solo traveler in town for a quick night, this was a great place to stay! It was a quick 5 min. walk to Fells Point area, and I felt safe on all the streets (even when walking back to the apartment at night by myself). I was afraid it would be noisy since it’s right off multiple bus lines, but the apartment was far enough back from the road and with the provided fan in the apartment, I fell right asleep! The place matched the pictures perfectly with a comfortable bed. The hosts were fantastic, responsive, and provided me with many local recommendations. I took the busses to get to/ from Penn Station and the free City Circular to explore other areas around Baltimore. I would definitely stay here again!
Both hosts and the place are great

Wonderful place, great communication. Very quiet and super good sleep. great surroundings. We had a lot of fun in the great apartment. Beautiful architecture, very flexible with check out. Thank you to these lovely people to provide us with such a nice place to stay.

For the location, privacy, ease of access, amenities and more- this airbnb was incredible for the price. The only trick is parking - but we found a spot easily on Caroline Street right around the corner. Will stay again next time we visit friends and family!

I can't say enough good things about Jen and Scott's place! The studio was a comfortable size, very clean, and stocked full of little extras that we could access (i.e., extra towels, blankets, etc.) My husband and I were both able to work remotely out of the space for a few hours during the day with no issue. The surrounding area is quiet and had easy, free street parking. We walked to dinner one night with no issues.
The real selling point, however, is how much thought has been put into the overall experience. Jen was super responsive via text the whole time we were in town, and the instructions for how to access the space, check-in and check-out procedures, etc. were clearly laid out in advance. It was overall a pleasure staying at the studio, and we'd happily return in the future!
Perfect spot for a business trip. Convenient location with lots of things nearby; I just didn’t get the chance to do them. Place was clean and comfy. Jen was very responsive and helpful.
It was a great stay; the hosts were responsive and provided detailed instructions on how to check in and out of the Airbnb!
Great little respite, conveniently located for walking around town.

Great place to stay. Very easy access, very close to Fells point and downtown. Streer parking and cheap lots near the area. The unit is extremely nice, very clean and tidy. Hosts are very responsive and the organization for the check in and out was great.

Nice place close to the restaurants and bars, parking wasn’t too difficult to find (I found free parking a 2 min walk away) We went on a chilly weekend though and the apartment didn’t warm up very well. They had a space heater to use in the apartment

This place was a gem! Instructions were clear, I had all the info I needed, and the room is gorgeous. The bed is super comfy!!
Great to be so close to Little Italy and *right on* multiple public transportation lines. Super convenient.
Hosts were responsive, thoughtful, and kind.
Heated bathroom floors, need I say more
Good location

Great value stay in cool location. Once inside, a welcome binder shows the backstory of the space, and it's impressive how the hosts have transformed this into a modern yet inviting place to stay! The place was so unique, clean, quiet, and comfortable for our stay. I enjoyed being so close to Fells and Harbor East.
5/5 overall, but solvable points of feedback for the benefit of future guests:
> I had an unannounced 11AM host visit, which interrupted a presentation I was making over Zoom. I didn't respond to the first two sets of knocks, but felt compelled on the third. The host wanted to pick up paint he forgot in the room. Given we had already established contact via app, I didn't understand why the owner couldn't message me to avoid an interruption and my feeling unsafe about who was requesting access.
> A few details in the binder / first-day messaging (e.g. metered parking, process for physical keys) would be useful in listing or confirmation for fully informed booking. Thanks!
Jenn and Scott’s place is our favorite stay in fells point. Super clean and everything you need for a weekend trip
Great place! Very central to shopping and Johns Hopkins Hospital. Upstairs neighbor is a loud walker, but the white noise machine and ear plugs help!
Great location! Really wonderful place for exploring baltimore.
Had a nice stay at this cozy studio. Its perfect for short term stays, but is not that well suited for longer stays.

Perfect little studio for a visit to Baltimore! Small kitchenette, small courtyard, and lovely bathroom; the ceilings are very high and make the space feel more spacious. Plenty of extra linens and 2 space heaters for the colder days. Walking distance to great restaurants. And Jen & Scott we’re very communicative and lovely hosts.
it's ok an ok location besides the parking and noise it's fine

We loved our stay here for an appt at Johns Hopkins. Found free parking around the corner on Caroline. Space was great, bed was comfy, shower was good, and nice high ceilings. Location was very walkable/ scooter to Fells Point and other nice areas. Would stay again!

Jennifer and Scott were incredibly flexible, responsive, and friendly hosts! The space was as advertised and very private. The area felt safe to walk around and offered plenty to do! We found free parking around the corner without issue. We would definitely recommend this space to anyone looking to explore Baltimore!

Great space. Hosts are very communicative. Close to the restaurant we went to. Only thing to say to other bookers is that the entranceway is very narrow—don’t bring huge bags, they’ll be difficult to get through.
The place was great- just as described. Easy check in and check out!
Very happy with our stay. Getting in was easy, great location for downtown, very clean, good price. Would definitely stay here again.
Great little studio in a location walking distance from so much. Loved the space and my stay in Baltimore
Very clean place. Great location.

This is a great studio apartment in a convenient location in Baltimore. All the amenities you need for a short or longer stay, in a clean neat spot. Close walk to the Fells Point bars and restaurants, and easily connected to the public transport system. Also great value for the price - would highly recommend!
absolutely wonderful stay! easy check in and check out and the place was very clean.
I loved the space it was nice and quiet. it was a decent part of the city and it fit all my needs would definitely come back.

Everything Jennifer and Scott described was what we found. The bed was exceptionally comfortable. We found the location very convenient for our touristing. As a historic neighborhood they were a little quirks to get used to but nothing was problematic at all for people using the bus the bus stop is right there and easy walking around and feels quite safe even though it is an in transition neighborhood. My boyfriend left his car unlocked overnight by accident and not a thing happened.

This studio is good if you’re in town for a couple days. Everything in Fells point, the inner harbor and Camden yards are within a reasonable walking distance. The hosts are very responsive and check in/out process is simple and flexible.
Awesome small place for a quick trip. Hosts were amazing, and very accommodating to our needs!! They allowed us check in early made trip much easier!
Every part of our stay here was perfect! Clear directions, fast, kind, and thorough communication, beautiful and clean space, And great area of town! Would definitely stay here again:)

Jennifer and Scott are wonderful hosts who took great care of us. The apartment is charming and in a great location. Lots of restaurants around.
Would come again ;-)
A great Airbnb! They have everything you need. And walking distance to so many great places. Had a great stay!

Really lovely unit! I loved the location near Whole Foods and many great restaurants and bars. I traveled alone and felt safe in the neighborhood, and parked 2 days in the recommended lot which was a quick walk to the apartment. Street parking would have been next to impossible, but I didn't mind paying for the lot as it was safe and convenient. I also appreciated the proximity to the Harbor Connector which runs for free on weekdays! The hosts were very helpful and allowed me to check in early. They also prepared a very detailed binder of info about the surrounding area.
Perfect, would stay again!

Private, quiet apartment in a walkable area. Close by to restaurants, bars, and other amenities like drug/grocery store. Good value for the space. Hosts made it easy to check in and out, and we’re flexible and accommodating with timing and luggage storage.
Very clean. Super comfy bed! Quick responses from hosts. We would stay here again!
I will be back! :) Fantastic stay!

Great place! Some of the surrounding streets are not where you’d want to walk alone at night, but it’s got great proximity to the harbor and amazing places to eat in Little Italy. Clean, comfortable, and definitely recommended for a day or two in Baltimore
Wonderful stay. Would stay again in a heartbeat.

The space is a great studio right downtown close to inner harbor and a bunch of stuff to do. Parking can be a bit of a pain but there are plenty of meters and parking garages around that you can use. Would definitely recommend for anyone new to Baltimore as Jennifer and Scott are both super helpful and have plenty of recommendations for things to see around!

We were in town for one evening and this place was exactly what we needed as a base of operations: clean, private, near restaurants, parking, and within walking distance of Camden, the Inner Harbor, and Fell’s Point.
Jennifer and Scott were friendly and great in terms of providing prompt, helpful tips and feedback.
Highly recommended!

This was an amazing stay. Jen and Scott thought of everything. Prior to our arrival, we were sent things to do and places to eat that were in a comfortable walking distance. Made it really easy to plan our day. They both communicated fast and are very accommodating. We flew in from TX and landed at 9am. We were able to leave our luggage at their residence until it was time to check in (they live around the corner). It was a rainy day and Jen/Scott ensured our room was ready early and moved our luggage for us. Truly went above and beyond. Not to mention, left us some waters and umbrellas. My husband always complains about where we sleep i.e. the mattress is too hard or too soft. I'll just say, he slept like a baby. Would and will definitely recommend.

The location of Jennifer and Scott’s place is ideal: about 4-5 blocks from Fell’s Point and the same for Little Italy. There is also great shopping and wonderful waterfront drinks/dining nearby. The space (studio) is small but enough room where you aren’t tripping over your luggage either. The communication was great with the hosts and there is a small outdoor space for coffee in the morning. We enjoyed our stay.

My 3rd time booking with Jennifer and Scott was just as great as the first two times. The space is lovely - it's private, convenient, and well put together. Thoughtful touches such as ear plugs (the space is not loud) French press, microwave, mini-fridge and air purifier make for a very comfortable weekend stay. The bed and pillows are super comfortable. Check in process is easy, host communication is perfect - why stay at a hotel?
Nice and convenient spot with lots of character, would definitely stay here again. Hosts were very communicative.
Great studio! Very private. Super comfortable bed. Perfect for 1 or 2 people for a weekend stay.
Second time staying here, and it's a great little spot. Would recommend for a couple who is just staying in Baltimore for a night or two and want to be close to Fells Point, Harbor East, etc.

Nice, clean apartment. Was very quiet and modern with great decor. Comfortable and very centrally located. Everything I did was within walking distance. I was able to many food options nearby, the harbor, Orioles baseball game, and Little Italy. Highly recommended.

Awesome property would definitely come back here again so convenient to everything in the inner harbor and my friends home which is nearby four blocks away Jen was phenomenal on her instructions check in check out
Jennifer and Scott’s place was perfect. Nicely tucked away in a very convenient part of Fells Point. Great little courtyard, walking distance to everything downtown.
A wonderful stay in Baltimore! Walkable to everything and very quiet and cozy for a short stay. We would definitely stay again our next time in Baltimore.
Fantastic location, walking distance to everything we were looking for. Jennifer was easy to communicate with and very accommodating!
Great, cozy room close to the action in Fells Point. Great communication by the hosts!

The studio apartment was clean and cozy, and the location was super convenient. We only had to walk a few blocks to find restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and a bit of shopping. We parked our car in a garage just 2 blocks down the street and were able to walk or take public transportation anywhere we wanted to go. Highly recommend for a comfortable and easy stay in Fells Point!

This is definitely one of the coolest Airbnbs my husband and I have ever stayed in. You can tell that Jennifer and Scott put a lot of thought and hard work into creating the perfect space. It was walking distance from many restaurants and bars that have live music most nights. We used electric scooters to get to and from farther areas. I would definitely recommend this location for anyone visiting Baltimore- Jennifer and Scott are great hosts!

Very clean and cozy but very basic, no TV, just a bed bathroom
And small fridge really. But convenient and cozy. Guest was responsive and nice. Left snacks and ear plugs which I thought was because of being on a busy street, but come 3am I found out it was because of a very noisy upstairs neighbor…. Loud footsteps, sounded like marbles rolling on the ground and jumping or running.
Probably won’t return to this place because of neighbor. Lucky for me I had to get up at that time anyways to go to the airport

This location was unfortunately subpar. It does not feel safe even though you are close to Fells Point. The place is across from a gas station and next door to a condemned building. When we arrived to check in there were men loitering on the sidewalk outside of the gate so we didn’t even stop. We went to dinner and actually planned to just go back home but decided to swing back by on our way out of town. When we went back the people were gone so we took our chances and stayed there. The room itself is okay but it wasn’t worth being in that area & having to worry about our car / who would be outside the gate in the morning - next time I’d get a hotel for the peace of mind. Hate to leave a bad review but I was fooled by all the positive reviews into thinking this was going to be a great place to stay and wished someone would have commented on how sketchy it is.

We stayed here two nights, and we enjoyed our stay. Absolutely great location! Jen and Scott provided a phenomenal and thorough list of places (restaurants, museums, breweries, etc.) to check out in the area! Thanks again for having us.

Great location so close to pretty much everything!! Great place to stay if u like going to the local restaurants and bars and all the food I tried around the Airbnb was great!! It was a overall great experience and I highly recommend!!! :)
A great location, spacious, quiet and clean, friendly and communicative hosts, etc.
This place is conveniently located in the heart of Baltimore. Fells Point and Downtown are just a short walk away! I would definitely recommend staying here on your next trip.
This place is great! Easy check-in and everything was explained on the listing. Parking at the garage ended up being more expensive than we thought, but everything else was perfect!
Fantastic hosts. The place was clean and the location perfect. Highly recommended.

Great little space in a good neighborhood. It was perfect for our trip to visit family. A short walking distance to the water and close to lots of great restaurants. The Airbnb itself was clean, perfect for 2 people. Check-in instructions were very well explained so when we arrived it was easy to get in. I appreciated the desk and table as my fiancé and I worked remotely one morning. My only suggestion would be to bring your own pillow if you need head/neck support. The pillows are flat but I ended up using the spare towels (there are a bunch thankfully) for extra support. The bed itself was comfortable. We would definitely stay here again!

Fantastic location, super clean studio. Perfect for a weekend getaway! Safe, quiet, private location. Jen and Scott are very thoughtful hosts. They make it easy as pie to get checked in and situated so you can focus more on your endeavors in Charm City.
Awesome space
It is a great place to stay and walking distance to many restaurants. We had a wonderful stay.

Beautiful space with a very interesting history. Clean and well stocked. Loved the architecture and the privacy afforded by the quiet courtyard. A block away from a very inexpensive parking garage and only a walk away from cute restaurants and the harbor.
Jennifer and Scott were both super flexible with our scattered schedule, and great at communicating! Highly recommend.
Amazing place in a perfect location! We really loved our stay at Jen and Scott’s place. We’d 100% recommend it to anyone!
Great spot to stay for a visit to Baltimore. Close to everything, as advertised, would stay again!
The studio was charming, secure, and clean. Great location with easy parking on the street. It was a quick walk to plenty of restaurants and attractions.
The best hosts! Truly goes above and beyond to make your experience great, cleanly, awesome location. Street Parking wasn’t bad at all.
Right near some of the best neighborhoods in Baltimore. Secluded and quiet. Great one-stop-shop!
Clean, private space in walking distance of some of highlights of Little Italy and fabulous food!
great place!
The space was exactly as advertised and very close to everything. I would definitely stay again. My only complaint is the parking, but that's city life.
Great stay with Jen and Scott. The perfect location to get out and explore Fells. Excellent and prompt communication was greatly appreciated.
This space is so cute and convenient to Fells Point, and very well appointed. I appreciated the coffee being available as well!
A great place in Fell’s Point! Close to everything but also quite and secluded. Very clean, would definitely stay here again!
We stayed here for 3 nights for the marathon. Great spot, loved the location. Space was perfect and host was awesome. Would definitely stay again. Just book it.

This was the perfect spot for our trip to Baltimore. Location was perfect and within walking distance of everything we wanted to do. Jen and Scott were very responsive and helpful the entire time. The studio was nice and roomy and clean and honestly we didn't have any complaints. I would highly recommend this to anyone who would want to spend some time in this area of Baltimore.

Great spot for a few nights. Check in was a breeze. The apt was clean, easy to get to, felt very safe, and the neighbourhood is very cool. Parking was tricky but we were successful in finding long term free spots around the corner on Bank. Be aware there isnt much of a kitchen but there are plenty of restaurants nearby. Joe at Lil Phils was weirdly hilarious, and Greg at the Blarney Stone poured a mean bitter.

Was a nice little place in a convenient location. We walked everywhere to and from there, no problem (if you like walking).
Little Italy is the next street over. Harbor/Fell's Point is a few lovely blocks away.
I was hoping there would be a fan to use, it was a little stuffy during the day...even with the AC on high. Also I couldn't figure out how to turn the heated floors on in the bathroom.
Oh and you can definitely hear people walking (sounded like stomping) above you, so if that bothers you.
Otherwise...clean & good location

Really great location for exploring Fells/Upper Fells. The room was just what we needed, a quiet, clean place to stay while in Baltimore for a busy weekend. Communication with Jen was great. We'd happily stay again when back in the area. One thing to note, there were a lot of mosquitos on the patio outside the room (probably just a product of visiting in September), but worth bringing bug-spray with you if you're susceptible to bites.

Initially we were nervous about the area never having been to Baltimore. However, a pretty short walk brings you to lots of restaurants, taverns, neighborhood markets, Little Italy, Little India, and Poland. Probably others we didn’t have time to discover. We found the people very friendly. Oh, the instructions for entering the space seem complex, but really aren’t. There is no tv, but it wasn’t missed.
It was a great experience
We really enjoyed our stay! Jennifer and Scott were communicative and helpful. The space was clean and close to downtown Baltimore.
Great location and space! Comfortable amenities and within walking distance to MECU pavilion, restaurants, etc. would definitely recommend a stay here.
Great space which provides a peaceful oasis amidst the hustle and chirp of Fells Point. Artful decor is innovative and thoughtful. Communication with hosts was outstanding. Highly recommended
Great space! Everything went smooth

Beautiful studio, clean and well kept. They provided us with all the essentials. Close to a lot of restaurants and shops. There’s a parking garage a block away with a cheap overnight rate. Overall a great place to stay at.
Such a beautiful space to stay in and really great hospitality. Felt extremely welcome and will definitely return whenever I can.
The location was very central & the space was nicely done. Jennifer and Scott provided clear instructions and were very responsive!

Nothing but positive things to say about our stay. Very clean studio, easy communication wt Jen, and amazing location. Also we found the AC to work fine, and the temperatures were nearing 100 degrees during our stay. Would def recommend and stay here again.
great job communicating
Cool studio apartment with original artwork. Great hosts, great communication, great location, highly recommend!

Great visit to Baltimore! The location was perfect - quiet and relaxing, while still being within walking (or scooting) distance to everything we wanted to do. We will definitely be adding this to our list of future trips!
Jen was very communicative and helpful. Place was in a great location for exploring the city.
Lovely, charming, unique place in a great location. Walkable to lots of terrific restaurants and nightlife, but private and quiet. We'll be back!

My boyfriend and I stayed here for one night. It's good walking distance to a lot of local shops, and is fairly close to Fells Point, which we liked. For being on a busy street, the room we had was in the back across the patio, so we didn't hear any city noise which was great. You can however hear every footstep from above, which can be annoying (especially since my bf is a light sleeper). The place also seems to be battling ants, we killed 1-2 in bed, and the AC does not cool the place down enough. There is no TV, but WIFI, which was appreciated. The bed is also super comfortable. For what the place used to be it's a nice small, clean place to crash for a night if you need something in the city.
I highly recommend this spot if you're looking for a clean affordable place. The photos of the place are very accurate. Jen was very flexible and rapid with communication. Overall, great stay!

My stay at Jen and Scott's place was perfect! Their communication was excellent and made check-in and check-out incredibly easy. The space is clean, modern, sleek, artistic, and most importantly comfortable. Street parking (especially for overnight) was somewhat difficult to find so I parked in a relatively inexpensive parking garage a 5-minute walk away overnight, which was perfect. Overall I am incredibly pleased with my stay and would highly recommend this place to anyone!
Great and funky space.
Great property, better value than hotel

The studio was everything we needed for a couples trip. It was centrally located between downtown/harbor area and Fells Point. Jen thought of all the little touches that make an air bnb feel like home and she was super responsive when we had questions! Definitely a great place to stay when visiting Baltimore.
Such a great place for 1-2 people! Walking distance to amazing restaurants and the harbor! We loved this place, and hope to stay here again in the future!
The hosts were very responsive, checkin was easy, great location for fells and walking downtown. We would stay again.

Jennifer and Scott’s place was perfect for our weekend trip to Baltimore. Close to many good restaurants, bars and harbor. Their place was super clean and exceeded our expectations. Definitely recommend!
Jennifer is very helpful and quick to respond! The location is perfect- a short walk to the harbor and a short walk to Little Italy. We’ll be back!
Great place, great host, perfect for a short stay.

Jennifer and Scott’s place was the perfect place for a quick weekend trip! The space was clean and a short walk away from Fells Point. They communicated how to lock doors and how to contact them if we ran into issues, which we really appreciated. I highly recommend their place!

The Place is nice and clean, the location is easy to find and easy to check in, within a block away there is a parking garage, which is very safe and close. One tiny issue is because is we are in the first floor, there seems some one upstairs is walking at the very early morning, it is a bit of noise that wake up us very early.

This is a cute little studio in a great, walkable location. We got everywhere on foot. Perfect for one or two people. The nearby bakery makes the air smell DELICIOUS.
The bed is comfy and the WiFi is great. My biggest issues were the dampness of the space (there was a dehumidifier that was full when we arrived), the noisy upstairs neighbors, and it was very toasty! There is an AC unit, but I'm not sure it's super efficient against the hot nights of summer.
Overall, this is an affordable space in a great spot. Cute little shared courtyard, which I enjoyed.

Jen/Scott’s place was perfect ! Great communication in coordinating check in. They held my luggage for me prior and moved it into the studio for me. Had everything I needed when I was there. Would def stay there again.

Great, unique space to stay, perfect for one night in Baltimore. Nice touches like snacks, and a white noise machine to help with city sounds. Location is on the border of Fell’s Point. We enjoyed it! And Jennifer was super prompt with communication. Thanks!!

The space is really cool with the courtyard. It's big for a studio. Pretty clean and the shower is cool. They have info on what the building used to be, so it was cool to learn about how the building came about! We would stay again!

10/10 in everything - price/location/communication/style. SO MANY SPARE TOWELS/WASH CLOTHS/PILLOWS/BLANKETS!!
AC wasn’t as powerful as I was hoping but otherwise 10/10, would stay again!

The room was very clean and had all the necessities and little amenities that made our stay an actual pleasure and not just a place to crash. The location is perfect for anyone who wants to visit the beautiful Fells Point neighborhood! Street parking was a little difficult, though.

Jennifer and Scott have a great set up that we highly recommend for anyone looking to spend some time in Baltimore. The location is mere blocks away from Fells Point, and along with it some truly must hit spots. Parking couldn't be easier, as there is a overnight garage one block over. And communication was easy and thorough. The space was nice and modern, and perfect for people looking to explore the city with a comfy spot to come back to. There were a couple points where the neighbors above were a bit loud, but it was rare and in no way anything to ruin the experience. We would (and just might) stay there again for how convenient and accessible it was.
Great for a quick trip back to Baltimore. Jen was a great host. Would stay again.
Great little studio, ideal for a quick trip.
Right in the middle of DT. Most places we needed to go was a 10 min walk or less. Hosts were very communicative too and the little court yard is really cute.
Jenn's place was the perfect spot for our weekend trip to Baltimore. We were in walking distance to so many restaurants and things to do. Jenn was very responsive. Highly recommend!

This is the perfect stay for a weekend getaway to the Baltimore area. It’s a great location that’s tucked away from the main, busy stretch but still within walking distance to the inner harbor. The co-host was very welcoming and available via text throughout the stay if any issues or questions arose. I highly recommend!!
Very thoughtfully designed space and cozy touches. We enjoyed our stay here and felt very comfortable overall.

My boyfriend and I stayed here for a quick trip to Baltimore, and the space was perfect! It was super close to the harbor and all of the bars and restaurants we wanted to hit in Fell’s Point. Jen was very helpful in providing trip suggestions and the room was very stylish.
Jennifer’s and Scott’s place was wonderful! It was very clean and stylish. We loved the location - it’s within walking distance to all that Fells Point has to offer. Would definitely stay here again!
Very well detailed and clean. Gave a lot of suggestions on where to go!!
Loved the place! Small yet just what we needed for a nice weekend away. Comfortable and easy!

Baltimore City is my Hometown and the unique historic spaces to die for! Jennifer & Scott’s place didn’t disappoint! Super unique, historic and great location! Love the outside courtyard and can’t wait to visit again! Thank You!!
great location and easy access

What an adorable studio! It was perfectly outfitted for our short stay. The WFH space was nicely set up and the kitchenette was appropriately supplied for our needs. The architecture is fun! I would definitely stay again.

Beautiful studio perfect for a weekend getaway. Walkable to anywhere you’d like to go in Baltimore. The location is safe, and it smells like fresh baked bread every morning! It’s a nice way to start the day. The studio is clean and attractive. It’s a small space but feels bigger than it is. Jen is a great host too. She made sure we had everything we needed with some Baltimore flair. Compared to the hotels close by, this is a much better and more convenient value. Fells Point has a lot to offer and this location is one of those gems.

good:

Great clean spot! The bed is super comfy and the bathroom was big for a studio space. There was some minor noise from whoever lives above the building walking around but nothing major since we didn’t stay in the Air BnB too much. Would definitely stay again!
Jennifer was in frequent contact with us our entire stay to make sure everything was perfect for us. It was a perfect place to stay for a weekend. They even had personal little touches to welcome us.
perfect location, exactly what we needed for a weekend trip
Very cute and stylish space in a central, convenient location. Jen was quick to respond to any questions, and I would highly recommend a stay here!

The location offered by Scott and Jen is simple and secluded a tender nook to escape some of the noise of the inner harbor and rest easy. We were able to interact with a lovely couple who were also staying under Jen and Scott. The room is modern and quaint a perfect place to unwind and disconnect after a long day exploring the sights and tastes the inner harbor has to offer and the many locations offered by our gracious hosts. The bathroom has a heated floor and was peaceful with a great shower. We did have a little bit of trouble with ants and a leak above the toilet. However, this is not a reflection of the comfort and sincerity for which Jen and Scott care for their residents. Jen was professionally and quickly responsive to any issue and I would be happy to stay with them anytime in the future.

Very neat and cute space. My girlfriend and I stayed here and it was the perfect size for us. The bed was comfortable and the heated tile in the bathroom was a nice touch!! The fridge and microwave was perfect for leftovers. They had a booklet with a lot of places to get food, get souvenirs, etc which was helpful. Whenever we had questions or concerns they responded right away! I felt really safe staying there with the custom lock code on the gate and the lock on the sliding door as well! Highly Recommend for a weekend or week retreat.
Nice hosts and very clear instructions for entrance!
Cool studio! Great location! We enjoyed it!

Very clean space with awesome features including: heated bathrooms floors, unique entrance and quaint courtyard. Within walking distance of waterfront Fells Point and little Italy. Would recommend to all.
Cute little stay. Had everything we needed there. Good location close to little Italy and little India. Me and my girl had a great time
Great stay!

I had a great stay at the this property. Jen and Scott were very responsive and flexible during my check-in. Will definitely visit again when I return to the area. Looking forward to warmer weather to enjoy the inviting courtyard area.

Expect a space that is visually appealing, though a lil bit smaller than expected. The high ceilings and clean space help my significant other and I forget about the covid world outside. Would highly recommend booking and I'll be back!

Great location and very private little studio. Location was good, right at the edge of where it gets too industrial. We were able to find parking outside or one block away all three days we were there and walked down to Fells Point multiple times for food and coffee. The tall ceilings and heated bathroom floors were very nice luxuries. Great little touches like phone charging cables of all sorts were already there. I recommend it if you're looking for a downtown experience close to Fells and the restaurants
The place is great for business or for a quick stop in Baltimore. Jennifer is great and very responsive

Excellent AirBnB. I've been to numerous AirBnB and John is a great host, proactive in his communication, accommodating, and very reasonable. Unit was clean, comfortable, and located in a walkable neighborhood. A bit loud cause you are right off the street as others have said but I did not find it particularly bothersome and was able to sleep without any issues. Would stay here again. Thanks John!

Thank you for the great place to stay John! The fireplace was such a treat as well as the comfy furniture! The bed was like sleeping on a cloud and the bedding was so soft and comfy. We honestly did not want to get out of bed this morning, lol. We loved all the walkable restaurants. The walks felt so safe and peaceful. We wish we could have stayed longer! Hope to come back.

I had such a great stay at John’s! It’s quiet and spacious with all the amenities. The bed was also very comfortable! Highly recommend! John was also very responsive to all my questions and offered early check-in when my flight was changed.
John was an excellent host and our stay was the cozy, relaxing getaway we had hoped for. Highly recommend.

Excellent stay! Cozy, comfy and private. So many great amenities throughout, everything you need and more. Found parking right out front. Walkable to all the things and more. 10/10 experience! Great space for a couple to get away for the night. Highly recommend! Also, John is an incredible host. Attentive, proactive and available, if you should need! Thanks again for everything!

Comfortable, clean, spacious. We stayed here the night of our wedding—was the perfect place to come back to after the ceremony! John was easy to work with, helpful, and friendly. Lovely neighborhood and pleasant for a morning walk to one of the nearby cafes. Would definitely recommend!

John’s place was fantastic! A great price for a couple nights’ stay close to fell’s point and the harbor. The bed, couch, etc were all very comfy and well designed and prepared for the guest.
Lastly, John was incredibly thoughtful and proactive. When I asked for a possible luggage storage situation upon checkout, he really went out of his way to see if this was possible and called me as well. A+ service on top of being available by text regularly.
Thanks for a great stay and hope to be back soon!
Amazing place to stay! It was well kept, clean, and just beautiful all around. John was very responsive and always checked in to make our stay more comfortable.
Definitely a great place to stay . Look forward to doing it again
super cute and clean.. would love to stay again!
John’s place was exactly as advertised, very convenient, and his communication with us was excellent!
Detailed instructions provided by host. Spacious accommodations with nice furniture.
Perfect little place in Baltimore. Check in was super easy and John was quick to respond. Has everything you would ever need! Encompasses everything an Airbnb should be.

John was so polite and very responsive. He was available for any questions and the apartment was spectacular. Apartment was just as listed. So beautiful and clean. I will definitely book with John again.

I was there for an overnight trip and John was kind enough to let me check in early. I also had some trouble opening the door and the fireplace, but he was super responsive and called me right away. The room was bigger and cozier than I imagined - would stay here again!
John’s place was absolutely perfect for my needs. Wish I could have stayed longer as the neighborhood seems very pleasant and walkable. Would stay again.

Great place and wonderful host!
Very private and spacious! Lots of little extras. Very responsive and communicative host. Loved the high ceilings and comfortable bed. Looking forward to staying again the next time I’m in Baltimore!

My husband and I had a delightful time at this Airbnb. Loved the fireplace as it added to the relaxful atmosphere! We simply parked our car for the couple days and walked to everything. We enjoyed watching March Madness inside this cozy place! Easy drive to the Baltimore airport where we picked our kids up at the end of our stay:)
This is one of my favorite Airbnbs and John is the best host. Always a good experience and I highly recommend it

John's place was a perfectly cozy home base for my visit this week. It's in an excellent location by Patterson Park, and John has made excellent use of the space. Great stay. Very convenient if you have an appointment at Hopkins. Comfortable and cozy. Enjoyed the fireplace.
A relaxing and convenient place for anyone looking to stay in the Baltimore area.
We love staying here for a quick weekend getaway! Very cozy and loved the fireplace and easy accessibility to downtown Baltimore! Would recommend and would absolutely stay here again!
I love this location.John is an amazing host.
Great location and lovely neighborhood. Apartment was extremely clean and well stocked with essentials. John is a great host and timely with responses. Definitely recommend staying here!
Wonderful place. Host was super responsive and gave great recommendations for dinner. Would definitely say here again.
I had a unique situation and John went out of his way to accommodate me. Great place. Was completely perfect for what we needed. Will definitely come back if I'm in that area again.

What an amazing spot! It’s very clear that John takes great pride in this place. It was immaculately clean and clear of clutter. The location was very convenient for anywhere we had to go. Overall, I will definitely be staying here again on our next trip to Baltimore. 10/10 recommend!
Awesome place - very clean and all you need !
love this location

My favorite part of the apartment is how collected and tasteful everything was — and the double-head shower! 👏🏼 Thank you, John, for your A+ hospitality. I’ll be back. :-)

This apartment is so unique and comfortable in a great part of Baltimore. We immediately wished we could stay longer! John was super friendly and responsive which made any questions we had answered on the dime.

Fun stay in a cool part of town, John was a great host and communicator. Would stay again.

I couldn’t ask for a more perfect stay! John’s place was so clean and quaint It honestly felt like home away from home. The fireplace was an amazing little touch. Next time I’m in Baltimore, I will definitely be booking with John again.

Very comfortable and spacious apartment. One of the best beds ever - hands down. Wish all Airbnb listings took their beds seriously. Super soft and comfy. Amazing shower. Temperature was perfect - nice and warm. Loved the fireplace. Highly recommend. John is friendly and responsive.

Amazing apartment - feels bigger than the pictures. John is a responsive and thoughtful host, and it shows in the details in the space. Kitchen and bathroom had everything I needed and more. Great stay near Patterson Park! Responsive host. Clean and beautiful stay. Centrally located. Beautifully designed space.
As a first time user of Airbnb, I can say that he made an amazing first impression with both the service and quality of the property for it to be advertised like it is in the photos. Fully recommend!

John has curated a lovely space that balances east Baltimore’s signature brown stone spaces with hints of pride for all the city has to offer. John's place was warm and inviting, with great internet (This is not always the case), and the bed "OMG," ridiculously comfortable. Also, he was very attentive and responsive. I hope to stay there again.

Our stay at John’s was perfect. The location was ideal, with convenient parking. He was very helpful and response throughout our trip. The keys were easy to access and the room was well appointed with everything we needed and more. The room itself was very comfortable and felt like home.

great stay in familiar surroundings!

I loved John’s place because I felt like I was getting the true Baltimore experience. The neighborhood was quite yet I felt safe walking to the local coffee shops and restaurants. I also want to thank John because he is an absolutely wonderful host. Book his place, you won’t regret it.

lovely and clean. easy to get around. nice part of the neighborhood
